The Book of Jeremiah

1 the ⁼¬declaration of·the ⁼God which was·generated·himself upon °¬Jeremiah ⁼the·one of·the Chelkiou out of·the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ which ¬dwelled in Anathōth in to·earth of·¬Benjamin

2 which was·been·generated saying of·the ⁼God unto °him in to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·¬Josiah ⁼son ⁼¬Amos ⁼king ⁼Yudah of·year ⁼¬thirteenth in to·the ⁼kingdom of·him

3 and was·generated·himself in to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ Iōakim ⁼son ⁼¬Josiah ⁼king ⁼Yudah ¬until of·eleventh ⁼year Sedekia of·son ⁼¬Josiah ⁼king ⁼Yudah ¬until of·the ⁼¬captivity ⁼Yerushalam in to·the ⁼fifth ⁼month

4 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

5 ¬before of·the·one °me to·¬mold °you in to·¬belly I·¬know·myself °you and ¬before of·the·one °you to·come·out out of·motherhood I·have·made·holy °you °¬prophet to °nations⁺ I·have·¬placed °you

6 and I·told ¬oh! ¬master ⁼lord ¬¡see! not I·¬know·myself to·speak ¬that young I* I·am

7 and told lord unto °me ńot ꜝsay ¬that young I* I·am ¬that unto °all⁺ ⁼which⁺ ifᵮ I·should·¬send·out °you you·will·¬travel·yourself and ¬according·to °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ ifᵮ I·should·¬order·myself to·you you·will·speak

8 ńot you·should·be·¬feared off of·¬face of·them ¬that with of·you I* I·am of·the·one to·self-¬take·out °you says lord

9 and ¬stretched·out lord °the ⁼hand of·him unto °me and touched·himself of·the ⁼mouth of·me and told lord unto °me ¬¡see! I·have·given °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me to °the ⁼mouth of·you

10 ¬¡see! I·have·¬appointed °you today upon °nations⁺ and °kingdoms⁺ to·¬uproot and to·¬ruin and to·¬destroy and to·¬rebuild and to·¬plant

11 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying °what you you·¬see ¬Jeremiah and I·told °¬staff ⁼¬of·walnut

12 and told lord unto °me beautifully you·have·¬seen ¬because I·have·¬arisen I* upon °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me of·the·one to·do °them

13 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me out of·second saying °what you you·¬see and I·told °¬kettle ⁼self-¬firing·up and the ⁼¬face of·him off of·¬face of·¬north

14 and told lord unto °me off of·¬face of·¬north will·be·¬been·enflamed the⁺ ⁼evils⁺ upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling °the ⁼earth

15 ¬because ¬¡see! I* I·¬call·together °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼kingdoms⁺ off of·¬north of·the ⁼earth says lord and they·will·¬come and they·will·¬place ¬each °the ⁼throne of·him upon °the⁺ ⁼¬thresholds⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·Yerushalam and upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼walls⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬surrounding of·her and upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·Yudah

16 and I·will·speak unto °them with of·judgment about of·all ⁼the ⁼evil of·them as they·¬left·behind °me and they·¬sacrificed to·Gods⁺ ⁼¬another'ses⁺ and they·¬worshipped to·the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·them

17 and you ꜝ¬gird·yourself °the ⁼¬loins of·you and ꜝ¬arise and ꜝtell unto °them °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ iᵮ I·should·¬order·myself to·you ńot you·should·be·¬feared off of·¬face of·them ńot·then you·should·be·¬frightened ¬in·front·of of·them ¬that with of·you I* I·am of·the·one to·self-¬take·out °you says lord

18 ¬¡see! I·have·¬placed °you in to·the·one today to·day as °city ⁼¬fortified and as °wall ⁼copper ⁼¬fortified to·¬alls⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼kings⁺ of·Yudah and to·the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·him and to·the ⁼people of·the ⁼earth

19 and they·will·¬fight °you and not ńot they·should·be·able·themselves unto °you ¬because with of·you I* I·am of·the·one to·self-¬take·out °you told lord

2 and told °¬these⁺ says lord I·was·¬remembered of·mercy of·youth of·you and of·love ⁼¬perfection of·you of·the·one to·¬follow °you to·the ⁼holy ⁼Yisra’el says lord

3 ⁼holy of·Yisra’el to·the ⁼lord ¬beginning of·¬offsprings⁺ of·him all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬eating °him ¬??? evils⁺ will·¬come upon °them ¬asserts lord

4 ꜝhear⁺ °saying of·lord house of·Ya‘aqob and all ⁼paternity of·house ⁼Yisra’el

5 °¬these⁺ says lord °what they·found the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ in to·me* °¬trespass ¬that they·¬left °¬long off myˊ and they·were·¬travelled ¬after of·the⁺ ⁼¬futiles⁺ and they·were·¬made·futile

6 and not they·told ¬where? is lord ⁼the ⁼¬leading °us out of·earth ⁼Egypt the ⁼¬directing °us in to·the ⁼¬deserted in to·earth ⁼¬unacquainted and to·¬impassable in to·earth ⁼¬waterless and to·¬unfruitful in to·earth in to·which not ¬went·through in to·her no·one and not ¬dwelled there son of·human

7 and they·¬brought·in °you⁺ to °the Karmēlon of·the·one to·¬eat °you⁺ °the⁺ ⁼fruits⁺ of·him and °the⁺ ⁼good⁺ of·him and you⁺·came·to and you⁺·¬stained °the ⁼earth of·me and °the ⁼¬inheritance of·me you⁺·¬placed·yourselves⁺ to °¬abomination

8 the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ not they·told ¬where? is lord and the⁺ ⁼self-¬clinging·to of·the ⁼law not they·¬knew·themselves °me and the⁺ ⁼¬flocksmans⁺ they·¬were·ungodly to °me* and the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ they·¬prophesied to·the ⁼¬Baal and ¬after of·¬useless they·were·¬travelled

9 through °this ¬still I·will·be·judged unto °you⁺ says lord and unto °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you⁺ I·will·be·judged

10 ¬because ꜝ¬pass·through⁺ to °¬islands⁺ Chettiim and ꜝ¬see⁺ and to Kēdar ꜝmission·off⁺ and ꜝ¬understand⁺ ¬very and ꜝ¬see⁺ if has·been·generated ¬such·as·thises⁺

11 if they·will·¬change·themselves nations⁺ °Gods⁺ of·them and these⁺ not they·are Gods⁺ then the ⁼people of·me ¬changed·himself °the ⁼¬glory of·him out of·which not they·will·be·¬helped

12 ¬amazed the ⁼heaven upon to·this and ¬shuddered upon °¬greater ¬very says lord

13 ¬that two °¬evils⁺ did the ⁼people of·me °me* they·¬left·behind °¬flow of·water of·life and they·¬dug to·¬selves⁺ °¬pits⁺ ⁼having·self-¬broken which⁺ not they·will·be·able·themselves °water to·¬hold

14 ńot servant is Yisra’el or ¬native-born·servant is through °what to °¬plunder was·generated·himself

15 upon °him they·¬roared·themselves lions⁺ and they·gave °the ⁼voice of·them which⁺ they·¬appointed °the ⁼earth of·him to °¬deserted and the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·him they·¬ruined ¬from °the·one ńot to·self-¬dwell

16 and sons⁺ Memfeōs and Tafnas they·knew °you and they·¬mocked of·you

17 ¬not! °these⁺ did to·you °the·one to·¬leave·behind °you °me* says lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you

18 and now °what to·you and to·the ⁼¬road of·Egypt of·the·one to·drink °water Gēōn and °what to·you and to·the ⁼¬road Assuriōn of·the·one to·drink °water of·¬rivers⁺

19 will·¬instruct °you the ⁼¬apostasy of·you and the ⁼evil of·you will·¬rebuke °you and ꜝknow and ꜝ¬see ¬that ¬bitter to·you the·one to·¬leave·behind °you °me* says lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you and not I·¬delighted upon to·you says lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you

20 ¬that off of·eternity you·¬broke °the ⁼¬yoke of·you you·¬tore·apart °the⁺ ⁼¬chains⁺ of·you and you·told not I·will·serve but I·will·¬travel·myself upon °all ⁼¬hill ⁼¬high and ¬under of·all ⁼¬wood ⁼¬shady there I·will·be·¬diffused in to·the ⁼fornication of·me

21 I* then I·¬planted °you °vine ⁼¬fruitbearing ⁼all ⁼¬true ¬how?! you·were·¬turned to °¬bitterness the ⁼vine ⁼the ⁼¬another's

22 ifᵮ you·should·¬wash·off·yourself in to·¬bleach and you·should·¬multiply to·yourself °¬herbage you·have·¬spotted·yourself in to·the⁺ ⁼¬unrighteousnesses⁺ of·you ¬in·front·of myˊ says lord

23 ¬how?! you·will·¬say not I·was·¬stained and ¬after of·the ⁼¬Baal not I·was·¬travelled ꜝ¬see °the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·you in to·the ⁼¬cemetery and ꜝknow °what you·did ¬late voice of·her ¬wailed °the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·her

24 ¬widened upon °waters⁺ of·¬deserted in to·¬desires⁺ of·soul of·her ¬was·carried·by·wind·himself was·¬delivered what will·¬turn °her all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬seeking °her not they·will·¬labor in to·the ⁼¬lowliness of·her they·will·find °her

25 ꜝ¬turn·away °the ⁼foot of·you off of·¬road ⁼¬rough and °the ⁼¬throat of·you off of·thirst the·one then told I·will·¬act·like·a·man·myself ¬that has·loved °¬another'ses⁺ and ¬after of·them ¬travelled·himself

26 as ¬shame of·thief ¬when should·¬capture thus they·will·be·¬been·ashamed the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el they and the⁺ ⁼kings⁺ of·them and the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·them and the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ of·them and the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ of·them

27 to·the ⁼¬wood they·told ¬that father of·me you·are you and to·the ⁼stone you you·engendered °me and they·¬turned upon °me* °¬backs⁺ and not °¬faces⁺ of·them and in to·the ⁼¬time of·the⁺ ⁼evils⁺ of·them they·will·¬say ꜝ¬arise and ꜝ¬save °us

28 and ¬where? they·are the⁺ ⁼Gods⁺ of·you °which⁺ you·did to·yourself if they·will·¬arise·themselves and they·will·¬save °you in to·¬time of·the ⁼¬oppression of·you ¬that ¬according·to °¬number of·the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·you they·were Gods⁺ of·you Yudah and ¬according·to °¬number of·¬corridors⁺ of·the ⁼Yerushalam they·¬sacrificed to·the ⁼¬Baal

29 so·that °what you⁺·speak unto °me all⁺ you⁺ you⁺·¬were·ungodly and all⁺ you⁺ you⁺·¬acted·lawlessly to °me* says lord

30 ¬in·vain I·¬struck °the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you⁺ °¬discipline not you⁺·¬received·yourselves⁺ ¬sword ¬devoured °the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ of·you⁺ as lion ⁼¬destroying and not you⁺·were·¬feared

31 ꜝhear⁺ °saying of·lord °¬these⁺ says lord ńot ¬deserted I·was·generated·myself to·the ⁼Yisra’el or earth ⁼having·self-¬made·barren through °what told the ⁼people of·me not we·will·be·been·lord and not we·will·¬come unto °you ¬still

32 ńot will·¬forget·himself bride °the ⁼cosmos of·her and virgin °the ⁼¬breastband of·her then the ⁼people of·me ¬forgot·himself of·me °days⁺ of·which⁺ not is ¬number

33 °what ¬still °beautiful you·will·¬apply in to·the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·you of·the·one to·¬seek °¬affection not thus but and you you·¬acted·wickedly·yourself of·the·one to·¬stain °the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·you

34 and in to·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·you they·were·found °bloods⁺ of·souls⁺ ⁼¬innocents⁺ not in to·¬ditches⁺ they·found °them but upon to·all ⁼¬oak

35 and you·told ¬innocent I·am but ꜝlet·them·be·¬turned·away the ⁼¬wrath of·him off myˊ ¬¡see! I* I·judge·myself unto °you in to·the·one to·say °you not I·sinned

36 °what you·¬despised ¬very of·the·one to·¬repeat °the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·you and off of·Egypt you·will·be·¬dishonored ¬as you·were·¬dishonored off Assour

37 ¬that and ¬from·here you·will·come·out·yourself and the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·you upon of·the ⁼head of·you ¬that ¬rejected·himself lord °the ⁼¬hope of·you and not you·will·be·¬gotten·along·well in to·her

3 ifᵮ should·¬send·out man °the ⁼woman of·him and should·come·off off of·him and should·be·generated·himself to·man ⁼óther ńot ¬returning will·¬return unto °him ¬still not self-¬staining will·be·¬stained the ⁼woman ⁼that and you you·fornicated·out in to·¬flocksmans⁺ ⁼many⁺ and you·¬returned unto °me says lord

2 ꜝ¬take·up to °¬straight °the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·you and ꜝ¬see ¬where? ¬not! you·were·¬defiled upon to·the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ you·¬seated to·them ¬like ¬crowbar ⁼¬layed·waste and you·¬stained °the ⁼earth in to·the⁺ ⁼fornications⁺ of·you and in to·the⁺ ⁼evils⁺ of·you

3 and you·had °¬flocksmans⁺ ⁼many⁺ to °¬stumbling·block to·yourself ¬face of·fornicator was·generated·himself to·you ¬cast·shame unto °all⁺

4 not as °house °me you·called and °father and °¬founder of·the ⁼virginhood of·you

5 ńot will·¬remain to °the ⁼eternity or will·be·¬protected to °¬altercation ¬¡see! you·spoke and you·did °the⁺ ⁼¬evils⁺ ⁼these⁺ and you·were·been·able

6 and told lord unto °me in to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·¬Josiah ⁼the ⁼king you·¬saw °which⁺ did to·me the ⁼¬dwelling of·the ⁼Yisra’el they·were·¬travelled upon °all ⁼mountain ⁼¬high and ¬under of·all ⁼¬wood ⁼¬woods and they·fornicated there

7 and I·told with °the·one to·fornicate °her °these⁺ ⁼all⁺ unto °me ꜝ¬live and not ¬lived and ¬saw °the ⁼¬breach-of-contract of·her the ⁼¬untrustworthy ⁼Yudah

8 and I·¬saw ¬because about of·all⁺ ⁼which⁺ was·¬grasped in to·which⁺ adulterized·himself the ⁼¬dwelling of·the ⁼Yisra’el and I·¬sended·out °her and I·gave to·her °¬scroll of·¬divorce to °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·her and not was·¬feared the ⁼¬untrustworthy ⁼Yudah and was·¬travelled and fornicated and she

9 and was·generated·himself to °no·one the ⁼fornication of·her and adulterized °the ⁼¬wood and °the ⁼stone

10 and in to·all⁺ ⁼these⁺ not was·¬turned unto °me the ⁼¬untrustworthy ⁼Yudah out of·¬all ⁼the ⁼heart of·her but upon to·lie

11 and told lord unto °me ¬justified °the ⁼soul of·him Yisra’el off of·the ⁼¬untrustworthy ⁼Yudah

12 ꜝ¬travel·yourself and ꜝ¬read °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼these⁺ unto °¬north and you·will·¬say ꜝbe·¬turned unto °me the ⁼¬dwelling of·the ⁼Yisra’el says lord and not I·will·¬establish °the ⁼¬face of·me upon °you⁺ ¬that ¬merciful I* I·am says lord and not I·will·¬be·infuriated to·you⁺ to °the ⁼eternity

13 ¬but ꜝknow °the ⁼¬unrighteousness of·you ¬that to °lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you you·¬were·ungodly and you·¬diffused °the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·you to °¬another'ses⁺ ¬under of·all ⁼¬wood ⁼¬woods then of·the ⁼voice of·me not you·¬obeyed says lord

14 ꜝbe⁺·¬turned sons⁺ having·¬left says lord ¬because I* I·will·¬master of·you⁺ and I·will·take·myself °you⁺ °one out of·city and two out of·paternity and I·will·¬bring·in °you⁺ to °¬Zion

15 and I·will·give to·you⁺ °¬flocksmans⁺ ¬according·to °the ⁼heart of·me and they·will·¬flocksman °you⁺ ¬flocksmaning with of·¬higher·knowledge

16 and will·be·himself ifᵮ you⁺·should·be·¬multiplied and you⁺·should·be·¬grown upon of·the ⁼earth in to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ ⁼those⁺ says lord not they·will·¬say ¬still ¬ark of·¬covenant of·holy ⁼Yisra’el not will·¬ascend·himself upon °heart not will·be·named not·then will·be·¬visitted and not will·be·done ¬still

17 in to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ ⁼those⁺ and in to·the ⁼¬time ⁼that they·will·call °the ⁼Yerushalam throne of·lord and they·will·be·¬assembled to °her all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ and not they·will·¬travel·themselves ¬still ¬after of·the⁺ ⁼¬thoughts⁺ of·the ⁼heart of·them of·the ⁼¬evil

18 in to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ ⁼those⁺ they·will·¬assemble·themselves house of·Yudah upon °the ⁼house of·the ⁼Yisra’el and they·will·¬come upon °the °it off of·earth of·¬north and off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬countries⁺ upon °the ⁼earth ⁼which I·¬allotted °the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·them

19 and I* I·told may·be·generated·himself lord ¬that I·will·¬appoint °you to °¬children⁺ and I·will·give to·you °earth ⁼¬select ⁼¬inheritance of·God ⁼¬almighty of·nations⁺ and I·told °father you⁺·will·call °me and off myˊ not you⁺·will·be·¬turned·away

20 ¬but as ¬rejects woman to °the ⁼¬·with to·her thus ¬rejected to °me* house of·Yisra’el says lord

21 voice out of·lips⁺ was·heard of·¬weeping and of·¬petition of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬that they·¬harmed in to·the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·them they·¬forgot·themselves of·God ⁼holy of·them

22 ꜝbe⁺·¬turned sons⁺ ¬turning and I·will·¬heal·myself °the⁺ ⁼¬ruins⁺ of·you⁺ ¬¡see! servants⁺ we we·will·be·ourselves to·you ¬that you lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us you·are

23 ¬really to °lie they·were the⁺ ⁼¬hills⁺ and the ⁼ability of·the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ ¬but through of·lord ⁼God of·us the ⁼¬salvation of·the ⁼Yisra’el

24 then the ⁼¬shame ¬consumed °the⁺ ⁼¬toils⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·us off of·youth of·us °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼calves⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·them

25 we·were·¬slept in to·the ⁼¬shame of·us and ¬covered °us the ⁼¬dishonour of·us ¬because ¬before of·the ⁼God of·us we·sinned we and the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·us off of·youth of·us ¬until of·the ⁼day ⁼this and not we·¬obeyed of·the ⁼voice of·lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us

4 ifᵮ should·be·¬turned Yisra’el says lord unto °me will·be·¬turned ifᵮ should·be·¬gone·around °the⁺ ⁼¬abominations⁺ of·him out of·mouth of·him and off of·the ⁼¬face of·me should·be·¬revered

2 and you·will·¬swear·yourself lives lord with of·¬truth and in to·judgment and in to·¬justice and they·will·¬praise in to·her nations⁺ and in to·him they·will·¬praise to·the ⁼God in to·Yerushalam

3 ¬that °¬these⁺ says lord to·the⁺ ⁼men⁺ of·Yudah and to·the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling °Yerushalam ꜝ¬plow·fallow·land⁺ to·¬selves⁺ °¬field·prepared·for·plowings⁺ and ńot you⁺·should·seed upon to·¬thorns⁺

4 ꜝbe⁺·¬circumcised to·the ⁼God of·you⁺ and ꜝ¬circumcise⁺·yourselves⁺ °the ⁼¬hardness·of·heart of·you⁺ men⁺ of·Yudah and the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling °Yerushalam ńot should·come·out as fire the ⁼¬wrath of·me and will·be·¬been·enflamed and not will·be·himself the ⁼¬extinguishing off of·¬face of·¬evil of·¬practices⁺ of·you⁺

5 ꜝ¬announce⁺ in to·the ⁼Yudah and ꜝlet·them·be·heard in to·Yerushalam you⁺·told ꜝsignify⁺ upon of·the ⁼earth to·trumpet and ꜝ¬cry⁺ °great ꜝtell⁺ ꜝbe⁺·¬assembled and we·should·come·to to °the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼walled⁺

6 ¬taking·up ꜝ¬flee⁺ to °¬Zion ꜝ¬hasten⁺ ńot ꜝstand⁺ ¬that °evils⁺ I* I·¬bring·upon off of·¬north and °¬breaking ⁼great

7 ¬ascended lion out of·the ⁼¬haven of·him ¬rooting·out °nations⁺ ¬expelled and came·out out of·the ⁼¬place of·him of·the·one to·¬place °the ⁼earth to °¬devastation and cities⁺ they·will·be·¬taken·down ¬from °the·one ńot to·self-¬dwell °them

8 upon to·these⁺ ꜝ¬gird⁺·yourselves⁺ °¬sackcloths⁺ and ꜝchop⁺·yourselves⁺ and ꜝ¬wail⁺ ¬because not was·¬turned·away the ⁼¬wrath of·lord off of·you⁺

9 and will·be·himself in to·that ⁼the ⁼day says lord will·¬destroy·himself the ⁼heart of·the ⁼king and the ⁼heart of·the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ and the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ they·will·¬amaze·themselves and the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ they·will·¬marvel·themselves

10 and I·told ¬oh! ¬master ⁼lord ¬therefore ¬indeed ¬tricking you·¬tricked °the ⁼people ⁼this and °the ⁼Yerushalam saying peace will·be·himself to·you⁺ and ¬¡see! touched·himself the ⁼¬sword ¬until of·the ⁼soul of·them

11 in to·the ⁼¬time ⁼that they·will·¬say to·the ⁼people ⁼this and to·the ⁼Yerushalam breath of·¬delusion in to·the ⁼¬deserted ¬road of·the ⁼daughter of·the ⁼people of·me not to °¬clean not·then to °holy

12 ⁼breath of·¬filling will·¬come to·me now then I* I·speak °judgments⁺ unto °them

13 ¬¡see! as cloud will·¬ascend·himself and as ¬blast the⁺ ⁼¬chariots⁺ of·him ¬lights⁺ of·eagles⁺ the⁺ ⁼horses⁺ of·him ¬woe! to·us ¬that we·¬grieve

14 ꜝ¬wash·off off of·evil °the ⁼heart of·you Yerushalam so·that you·should·be·¬saved ¬until ¬when? they·will·¬be·already in to·you ¬reasonings⁺ of·¬travails⁺ of·you

15 ¬because voice of·¬announcing out Dan will·¬come and will·be·heard ¬travail out of·mountain of·¬Ephraim

16 ꜝ¬remind⁺ °nations⁺ ¬¡see! they·¬come ꜝ¬announce⁺ in to·Yerushalam ¬commotions⁺ they·come·themselves out of·earth ¬from·afar and they·gave upon °the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·Yudah °voice of·them

17 as ¬keeping °field they·were·generated·themselves upon °her ¬surrounding ¬that myˊ you·¬neglected says lord

18 the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·you and the⁺ ⁼¬practices⁺ of·you they·did °these⁺ to·you this ⁼the ⁼evil of·you ¬that ¬bitter ¬that touched·himself ¬until of·the ⁼heart of·you

19 °the ⁼¬belly of·me °the ⁼¬belly of·me I·¬ache and °the⁺ ⁼¬senses⁺ of·the ⁼heart of·me ¬is·irresistibly·led the ⁼soul of·me ¬convulses·himself the ⁼heart of·me not I·will·¬be·quiet·myself ¬that °voice of·trumpet heard the ⁼soul of·me °¬shouting of·¬war

20 and °¬misery °¬break ¬calls·himself ¬that has·¬grieved all ⁼the ⁼earth ¬suddenly has·¬grieved the ⁼¬tent they·were·¬torn·apart the⁺ ⁼¬hide·coverings⁺ of·me

21 ¬until ¬when? I·will·¬see·myself °¬fleeing hearing °voice of·trumpets⁺

22 ¬because the⁺ ⁼self-¬governing of·the ⁼people of·me °me* not they·had·¬seen sons⁺ ⁼¬foolishes⁺ they·are and not ¬intelligents⁺ ⁼wise⁺ they·are of·the·one to·do·evil °the·one then beautifully to·do not they·¬came·to·know

23 I·¬looked·upon upon °the ⁼earth and ¬¡see! °no·one and to °the ⁼heaven and not was the⁺ ⁼lights⁺ of·him

24 I·¬saw °the⁺ ⁼mountains⁺ and was ¬trembling and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬hills⁺ ⁼¬troubling

25 I·¬looked·upon and ¬¡see! not was human and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ of·the ⁼heaven ¬frightened·himself

26 I·¬saw and ¬¡see! the Karmēlos ¬deserted and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ ⁼having·been·¬burned to·fire off of·¬face of·lord and off of·¬face of·¬wrath of·¬wrath of·him they·were·¬destroyed

27 °¬these⁺ says lord ¬deserted will·be·himself all ⁼the ⁼earth °¬consummation then not ńot I·will·do

28 upon to·these⁺ ꜝlet·them·¬mourn the ⁼earth and ꜝlet·them·¬darken the ⁼heaven ¬from·above ¬because I·spoke and not I·will·¬repent I·¬stampeded and not I·will·¬turn·away off of·her

29 off of·voice of·horseman and of·having·been·¬stretched·tight of·¬bow ¬left all ⁼¬country they·¬entered·into to °the⁺ ⁼caves⁺ and to °the⁺ ⁼¬sacred·groves⁺ they·were·¬hidden and upon °the⁺ ⁼rocks⁺ they·¬ascended all ⁼city was·¬left·behind not ¬dwells in to·them human

30 and you °what you·will·do ifᵮ you·should·¬clothe·yourself °¬scarlet and you·should·cosmos·yourself to·cosmos ⁼gold and ifᵮ you·should·¬rub·on·yourself to·¬antimony °the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·you to ¬in·vain the ⁼¬finery of·you they·¬rejected·themselves °you the⁺ ⁼¬lovers⁺ of·you °the ⁼soul of·you they·¬seek

31 ¬that °voice as of·¬·in·labor I·heard of·the ⁼¬groan of·you as of·¬giving·birth·first·time voice of·daughter ⁼¬Zion will·be·¬fainted and will·¬neglect °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·her ¬alas! I* ¬that ¬fails the ⁼soul of·me upon to·the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬killed

2 lives lord they·say through °this not upon to·lying⁺ they·¬swear

3 lord the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·you to °¬trust you·¬whipped °them and not they·¬suffered·pain you·¬completed °them and not they·¬willed to·self-¬receive °¬discipline they·¬strengthened °the⁺ ⁼¬faces⁺ of·them ¬above °rock and not they·¬willed to·be·¬turned

16 and you ńot ꜝ¬pray·yourself about of·the ⁼people ⁼this and ńot ꜝ¬deem·worthy·yourself of·the·one to·be·¬had·mercy °them and ńot ꜝ¬pray·yourself and ńot ꜝcome·unto to·me about of·them ¬that not I·will·¬listen·to·myself

21 °¬these⁺ says lord °the⁺ ⁼¬burnt·offerings⁺ of·you⁺ ꜝ¬assemble⁺ with of·the⁺ ⁼¬sacrifices⁺ of·you⁺ and you⁺·will·¬eat °meats⁺

22 ¬that not I·spoke unto °the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ and not I·¬ordered·myself to·them in to·day ⁼which I·¬led °them out of·earth ⁼Egypt about of·¬burnt·offerings⁺ and of·¬sacrifice

23 but or °the ⁼¬declaration ⁼this I·¬ordered·myself to·them saying ꜝhear⁺ of·the ⁼voice of·me and I·will·be·myself to·you⁺ to °God and you⁺ you⁺·will·be·yourselves⁺ to·me to °people and ꜝ¬travel⁺·yourselves⁺ in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·me to·which⁺ iᵮ I·should·¬order·myself to·you⁺ ¬that iᵮ ¬well should·be to·you⁺

25 off of·which ⁼day they·came·out the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·them out of·earth ⁼Egypt and ¬until of·the ⁼day ⁼this and I·¬sended·out unto °you⁺ °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼servants⁺ of·me °the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ of·day and of·¬dawn and I·missioned·off

27 and you·will·¬say to·them °the ⁼saying ⁼this this ⁼the ⁼nation ⁼which not heard of·the ⁼voice of·lord not·then ¬received·himself °¬discipline ¬failed the ⁼¬trust out of·mouth of·them

29 ꜝ¬shear·yourself °the ⁼head of·you and ꜝ¬throw·off and ꜝ¬take·up upon of·lips⁺ °¬lamentation ¬that ¬rejected lord and ¬rejected·himself °the ⁼generation ⁼the ⁼doing °these⁺

30 ¬that they·did the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yudah °the ⁼¬evil ¬in·front·of myˊ says lord they·¬appointed °the⁺ ⁼¬abominations⁺ of·them in to·the ⁼house ¬whither has·¬called·himself the ⁼name of·me upon °him of·the·one to·¬stain °him

31 and they·¬built °the ⁼¬altar of·the Tafeth which is in to·¬valley of·son Ennom of·the·one to·¬burn °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·them in to·fire which not I·¬ordered·myself to·them and not I·was·¬considered in to·the ⁼heart of·me

32 through °this ¬¡see! days⁺ they·come·themselves says lord and not they·will·¬say ¬still ¬altar of·the Tafeth and ¬valley of·son Ennom but or ¬valley of·the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬killed and they·will·¬bury in to·the Tafeth through °the·one ńot to·¬be·already °¬place

33 and they·will·be·themselves the⁺ ⁼corpses⁺ of·the ⁼people ⁼this to °¬eating to·the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ of·the ⁼heaven and to·the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼earth and not will·be·himself the ⁼¬frightening·away

34 and I·will·¬destroy out of·cities⁺ of·Yudah and out of·¬corridors⁺ of·Yerushalam °voice of·self-¬celebrating and °voice of·¬rejoicing °voice of·bridegroom and °voice of·bride ¬that to °¬devastation will·be·himself all ⁼the ⁼earth

8 in to·the ⁼¬time ⁼that says lord they·will·¬bring °the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼kings⁺ of·Yudah and °the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·him and °the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling °Yerushalam out of·the⁺ ⁼¬graves⁺ of·them

2 and they·will·¬cool °them unto °the ⁼sun and °the ⁼luna and unto °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼stars⁺ and unto °all ⁼the ⁼¬army of·the ⁼heaven °which⁺ they·loved and to·which⁺ they·served and of·which⁺ they·were·¬travelled ¬after of·them and of·which⁺ they·¬clinged·to·themselves and to·which⁺ they·¬worshipped to·them not they·will·be·chopped and not they·will·be·¬buried and they·will·be·themselves to °¬model upon of·¬face of·the ⁼earth

3 ¬that they·¬chose·themselves °the ⁼death or °the ⁼life and to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬remainings⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬left·behind off of·the ⁼generation ⁼that in to·all ⁼¬place ¬whither ifᵮ I·will·¬expel °them there

4 ¬that °¬these⁺ says lord ńot the ⁼¬collapsing not ¬arises·himself or the ⁼¬turning·away not ¬turns

5 through °what ¬turned·away the ⁼people of·me this °¬rejection ⁼¬impudent and they·were·¬held·firmly in to·the ⁼¬resolve of·them and not they·¬willed of·the·one to·¬turn

6 ꜝ¬listen·to⁺·yourselves⁺ ¬so and ꜝhear⁺ not thus they·will·speak not is human ⁼¬repenting off of·the ⁼evil of·him saying °what I·did ¬stopped the ⁼¬running off of·the ⁼¬racecourse of·him as horse ⁼¬sweating in to·¬snorting of·him

10 through °this I·will·give °the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·them to·óthers⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼fields⁺ of·them to·the⁺ ⁼¬heirs⁺

13 and they·will·¬assemble °the⁺ ⁼¬offsprings⁺ of·them says lord not is ¬grape in to·the⁺ ⁼vines⁺ and not is ¬figs⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼¬fig·trees⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬leafs⁺ has·¬flowed·down

9 what may·give to·me in to·the ⁼¬deserted °¬doorpost ⁼¬last and I·will·¬leave·behind °the ⁼people of·me and I·will·come·off·myself off of·them ¬that all⁺ they·adulterize·themselves ¬convocation of·¬rejecting

2 and they·¬stretched·tight °the ⁼tongue of·them as °¬bow lie and not ¬trust ¬strengthened upon of·the ⁼earth ¬that out of·evils⁺ to °evils⁺ they·came·out and °me* not they·knew

19 I* then as °lamb ⁼¬innocent ⁼self-¬bringing of·the·one to·self-¬sacrifice not I·knew upon °me* they·¬counted·themselves °¬thought ⁼¬evil saying ¬come and we·should·throw·in °¬wood to °the ⁼bread of·him and we·should·¬obliterate °him off of·earth of·living and the ⁼name of·him not ńot should·be·¬remembered ¬still

21 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord upon °the⁺ ⁼men⁺ Anathōth °the⁺ ⁼¬seeking °the ⁼soul of·me °the⁺ ⁼saying not ńot you·should·¬prophesy upon to·the ⁼name of·lord if then ńot you·will·die·off·yourself in to·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·us

22 ¬¡see! I* I·will·¬visit·myself upon °them the⁺ ⁼youths⁺ of·them in to·¬sword they·will·die·off·themselves and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·them and the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·them they·will·¬decease in to·¬famine

12 ¬just you·are lord ¬that I·will·¬defend·oneself·myself unto °you ¬but °judgments⁺ I·will·speak unto °you °what ¬that ¬road of·¬ungodlies⁺ ¬gets·along·well·himself they·¬prospered all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬rejecting °¬disregardings⁺

2 you·¬planted °them and they·rooted they·¬produced·children and they·did °fruit ¬near you·are you of·the ⁼mouth of·them and ¬far off of·the⁺ ⁼¬kidneys⁺ of·them

3 and you lord you·know °me you·have·¬tested °the ⁼heart of·me ¬in·front·of of·you ꜝ¬purify °them to °day of·¬slaughter of·them

4 ¬until ¬when? will·¬mourn the ⁼earth and all ⁼the ⁼¬grass of·the ⁼field will·be·dried·up off of·evil of·the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling in to·her they·were·¬destroyed ¬animals⁺ and winglings⁺ ¬that they·told not will·¬see·himself the ⁼God °¬roads⁺ of·us

5 of·you the⁺ ⁼feet⁺ they·¬run and they·¬faint °you ¬how?! should·¬prepare upon to·horses⁺ and in to·earth of·peace you you·have·¬persuaded ¬how?! you·will·do in to·¬neighing of·the ⁼¬Jordan

6 ¬that and the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·you and the ⁼house of·the ⁼father of·you and these⁺ they·¬rejected °you and they they·¬cried·out out of·the·ones⁺ ¬after of·you they·were·¬gathered ńot you·should·trust in to·them ¬that they·will·speak unto °you °beautiful⁺

7 I·have·¬left·behind °the ⁼house of·me I·¬released °the ⁼¬inheritance of·me I·gave °the ⁼having·self-loved ⁼soul of·me to °hands⁺ of·¬enemies⁺ of·her

8 was·been·generated the ⁼¬inheritance of·me to·me* as lion in to·¬grove gave upon °me* °the ⁼voice of·her through °this I·¬hated °her

9 ńot cave hyena the ⁼¬inheritance of·me to·me* or cave ¬surrounding of·her ꜝ¬proceed⁺ ꜝ¬assemble⁺ °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼field and ꜝlet·come⁺ of·the·one to·¬eat °her

10 ¬flocksmans⁺ ⁼many⁺ they·¬destroyed °the ⁼vineyard of·me they·¬defiled °the ⁼¬part of·me they·gave °¬part ⁼¬one·who·desires of·me to °¬deserted ⁼¬impassable

11 was·¬placed to °¬disappearance of·¬destruction through °me* to·¬disappearance was·¬destroyed all ⁼the ⁼earth ¬that not is man ⁼self-¬placing in to·heart

12 upon °all ⁼¬mountain·pass in to·the ⁼¬deserted they·came ¬grieving ¬that ¬sword of·the ⁼lord will·¬devour·himself off of·¬end of·the ⁼earth ¬until of·¬end of·the ⁼earth not is peace to·all ⁼flesh

13 ꜝseed⁺ °¬wheats⁺ and °¬thorns⁺ ꜝ¬reap⁺ the⁺ ⁼¬lots⁺ of·them not they·will·¬help °them ꜝbe⁺·¬been·ashamed off of·¬pride of·you⁺ off of·¬reproach ¬before of·lord

14 ¬that °¬these⁺ says lord about of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬neighbors⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬evils⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-touching of·the ⁼¬inheritance of·me of·which I·¬divided to·the ⁼people of·me to·Yisra’el ¬¡see! I* I·¬draw·away °them off of·the ⁼earth of·them and °the ⁼Yudah I·will·throw·out out of·¬midst of·them

15 and will·be·himself with °the·one to·be·going·to·throw·out °me °them I·will·¬turn and I·will·¬have·mercy °them and I·will·¬settle °them °¬each to °the ⁼¬inheritance of·him and °¬each to °the ⁼earth of·him

16 and will·be·himself ifᵮ studying they·should·study °the ⁼¬road of·the ⁼people of·me of·the·one to·¬swear to·the ⁼name of·me lives lord ¬as they·¬taught °the ⁼people of·me to·¬swear to·the ⁼¬Baal and they·will·be·¬built in to·¬midst of·the ⁼people of·me

17 ifᵮ then ńot they·should·¬turn and I·will·¬expel °the ⁼nation ⁼that to·¬departure and to·¬destruction

13 °¬these⁺ says lord ꜝ¬proceed and ꜝ¬possess·yourself to·yourself °¬loincloth ⁼¬of·flaxen·linen and ꜝ¬put·on·yourself about °the ⁼¬loins of·you and in to·water not will·¬pass·through·himself

2 and I·¬possessed·myself °the ⁼¬loincloth ¬according·to °the ⁼saying of·lord and I·¬put·on about °the ⁼¬loins of·me

3 and was·been·generated saying of·lord unto °me saying

4 ꜝtake °the ⁼¬loincloth ⁼the·one about °the ⁼¬loins of·you and ꜝ¬arise and ꜝ¬proceed upon °the ⁼¬Euphrates and ꜝ¬hide °it there in to·the ⁼¬hole of·the ⁼rock

6 and was·generated·himself with °days⁺ ⁼many⁺ and told lord unto °me ꜝ¬arise ꜝ¬proceed upon °the ⁼¬Euphrates and ꜝtake ¬from·there °the ⁼¬loincloth ⁼which I·¬ordered·myself to·you of·the·one to·¬hide there

9 °¬these⁺ says lord thus I·will·¬destroy °the ⁼¬mistreatment of·Yudah and °the ⁼¬mistreatment of·Yerushalam

10 °the ⁼much ⁼this ⁼¬mistreatment °the·ones⁺ ńot °self-¬planing to·¬obey of·the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me and °¬travelled ¬after of·Gods⁺ ⁼¬another'ses⁺ of·the·one to·serve to·them and of·the·one to·¬worship to·them and they·will·be·themselves ¬just·as the ⁼¬loincloth ⁼this ⁼which not will·be·¬lended to °no·one

14 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °¬Jeremiah about of·the ⁼¬drought

2 ¬mourned the ⁼Yudaea and the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·her they·were·¬emptied and they·were·¬darkened upon of·the ⁼earth and the ⁼¬shouting of·the ⁼Yerushalam ¬ascended

3 and the⁺ ⁼¬great·mans⁺ of·her they·missioned·off °the⁺ ⁼young⁺ of·them upon °water they·came upon °the⁺ ⁼¬wells⁺ and not they·found °water and they·¬turned·away °the⁺ ⁼¬jars⁺ of·them °¬empties⁺

4 and the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·the ⁼earth ¬failed ¬that not was ¬rain they·were·¬been·ashamed ¬farmers⁺ they·¬covered °the ⁼head of·them

5 and ¬hinds⁺ in to·field they·¬gave·birth·to and they·¬left·behind ¬that not was ¬crop

6 donkeys⁺ ⁼of·the·field⁺ they·stood upon °¬groves⁺ they·¬drew °¬wind they·¬failed the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·them ¬that not was ¬grass off of·people of·¬unrighteousness

7 if the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·us they·¬opposed to·us lord ꜝdo to·us ¬because·of of·you ¬that many⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·us ¬in·front·of of·you ¬that to·you we·sinned

8 ¬perseverance of·Yisra’el lord and you·¬save in to·¬time of·evils⁺ so·that °what you·were·been·generated ¬like ¬foreigner upon of·the ⁼earth and as ¬native-born ⁼¬turning·from to °¬guest·room

9 ńot you·will·be·yourself ¬just·as human ⁼¬sleeping or as man not self-able to·¬save and you in to·us you·are lord and the ⁼name of·you has·¬called·himself upon °us ńot should·¬forget of·us

10 thus says lord to·the ⁼people ⁼this they·loved to·¬move °feet⁺ of·them and not they·¬spared·themselves and the ⁼God not ¬delighted in to·them now will·be·¬remembered of·the⁺ ⁼¬unrighteousnesses⁺ of·them

11 and told lord unto °me ńot ꜝ¬pray·yourself about of·the ⁼people ⁼this to °good⁺

12 ¬that ifᵮ they·should·fast not I·will·¬listen·to·myself of·the ⁼¬petition of·them and ifᵮ they·should·¬bring·to °¬burnt·offerings⁺ and °¬sacrifices⁺ not I·will·¬delight in to·them ¬that in to·¬sword and in to·¬famine and in to·death I* I·will·¬complete °them

13 and I·told ¬oh! lord ¬¡see! the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ of·them they·¬prophesy and they·say not you⁺·will·¬see·yourselves⁺ °¬sword not·then ¬famine will·be·himself in to·you⁺ ¬that °¬truth and °peace I·will·give upon of·the ⁼earth and in to·the ⁼¬place ⁼this

15 and told lord unto °me ifᵮ should·stand Mosheh and ¬Samuel ¬before of·¬face of·me not is the ⁼soul of·me unto °them ꜝ¬send·out °the ⁼people ⁼this and ꜝlet·come·out⁺

2 and will·be·himself ifᵮ they·should·tell unto °you ¬where? we·will·come·out·ourselves and you·will·¬say unto °them °¬these⁺ says lord whatever⁺ to °death to °death and whatever⁺ to °¬sword to °¬sword and whatever⁺ to °¬famine to °¬famine and whatever⁺ to °¬captivity to °¬captivity

3 and I·will·¬avenge upon °them °four⁺ ⁼¬appearances⁺ says lord °the ⁼¬sword to °¬slaughter and °the⁺ ⁼dogs⁺ to °¬tearing·in·pieces and °the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼earth and °the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ of·the ⁼heaven to °¬eating and to °¬decay

4 and I·will·¬deliver °them to °¬necessities⁺ to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼kingdoms⁺ of·the ⁼earth through °¬Manasseh ⁼son of·¬Hezekiah °king of·Yudah about of·all⁺ ⁼which⁺ did in to·Yerushalam

5 what will·¬spare·himself upon to·you Yerushalam and what will·¬be·timid upon to·you or what will·¬return to °peace to·you

8 they·were·¬multiplied widows⁺ of·them ¬above °the ⁼¬sand of·the ⁼sea they·¬brought·upon upon °mother of·youth °¬misery in to·¬noon I·¬threw·on upon °her ¬suddenly °¬trembling and °¬diligence

10 ¬alas! I* mother as °what⁺ °me you·¬gave·birth·to °man ⁼self-¬acting·as·judge and °self-¬judging to·all ⁼the ⁼earth not·also I·¬helped not·also ¬helped °me no·one the ⁼¬strength of·me ¬failed in to·the⁺ ⁼self-¬cursing °me

15 lord ꜝbe·¬remembered of·me and ꜝ¬visit·yourself °me and ꜝ¬acquit °me off of·the⁺ ⁼¬seeking °me ńot to °¬patience ꜝknow as I·took about of·you °¬reproach

18 so·that °what the⁺ ⁼¬grieving °me they·¬prevail of·me the ⁼¬plague of·me ¬strong ¬whence I·will·be·¬healed self-generated was·been·generated to·me as water ⁼lying not having °¬trust

19 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord ifᵮ you·should·¬turn and I·should·¬restore °you and ¬before of·¬face of·me you·will·stand·yourself and ifᵮ you·should·¬lead·out °¬precious off of·¬unworthy as mouth of·me you·will·be·yourself and they·will·¬live they unto °you and you not you·will·¬live unto °them

20 and I·will·give °you to·the ⁼people ⁼this as °wall ⁼¬fortified ⁼copper and they·will·¬fight unto °you and not ńot they·should·be·able·themselves unto °you ¬because with of·you I·am of·the·one to·¬save °you

16 and you ńot you·should·take °woman says lord ⁼the ⁼God of·Yisra’el

2 and not will·be·engendered to·you son not·then daughter in to·the ⁼¬place ⁼this

3 ¬that °¬these⁺ says lord about of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ and about of·the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼engendered in to·the ⁼¬place ⁼this and about of·the⁺ ⁼mothers⁺ of·them of·the⁺ ⁼having·¬given·birth·to °them and about of·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·them ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·engendered °them in to·the ⁼earth ⁼this

4 in to·death ⁼¬diseased they·will·die·off·themselves not they·will·be·chopped and not they·will·be·¬buried to °¬model upon of·¬face of·the ⁼earth they·will·be·themselves and to·the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼earth and to·the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ of·the ⁼heaven in to·¬sword they·will·¬collapse·themselves and in to·¬famine they·will·be·¬completed

5 °¬these⁺ says lord ńot you·should·come·to to °¬revelry of·them and ńot you·should·be·¬travelled of·the·one to·self-chop and ńot you·should·¬mourn °them ¬that I·have·¬left °the ⁼peace of·me off of·the ⁼people ⁼this

6 not ńot they·should·chop·themselves °them not·then °¬cuts⁺ not ńot they·should·do and not they·will·¬shave·themselves

8 to °house of·¬carousing not you·will·come·to·yourself to·¬sit·down·with with of·them of·the·one to·¬eat and to·drink

9 ¬because °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼the ⁼God of·Yisra’el ¬¡see! I* I·¬destroy out of·the ⁼¬place ⁼this ¬before of·the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·you⁺ and in to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·you⁺ °voice of·¬joy and °voice of·¬joy °voice of·bridegroom and °voice of·bride

10 and will·be·himself ¬when you·should·¬announce to·the ⁼people ⁼this °¬alls⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ ⁼these⁺ and they·should·tell unto °you through °what spoke lord upon °us °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼evils⁺ ⁼these⁺ what ⁼the ⁼¬unrighteousness of·us and what ⁼the ⁼sin of·us °which we·sinned ¬before of·lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us

11 and you·will·¬say to·them anti of·which⁺ they·¬left·behind °me the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ says lord and they·¬were·undone·themselves ¬after of·Gods⁺ ⁼¬another'ses⁺ and they·served to·them and they·¬worshipped to·them and °me* they·¬left·behind and °the ⁼law of·me not they·¬kept·themselves

12 and you⁺ you⁺·¬acted·wickedly·yourselves⁺ ¬above °the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ and ¬¡see! you⁺ you⁺·¬travel·yourselves⁺ ¬each ¬after of·the⁺ ⁼¬pleasings⁺ of·the ⁼heart of·you⁺ of·the ⁼¬evil of·the·one ńot to·¬obey of·me

13 and I·will·¬throw·off °you⁺ off of·the ⁼earth ⁼this to °the ⁼earth ⁼which not you⁺·had·¬seen you⁺ and the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ and you⁺·will·serve there to·Gods⁺ ⁼óthers⁺ which⁺ not they·will·give to·you⁺ °mercy

14 through °this ¬¡see! days⁺ they·come·themselves says lord and not they·will·¬say ¬still lives lord ⁼the ⁼¬leading °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el out of·earth ⁼Egypt

15 but lives lord ⁼which ¬led °the ⁼house of·Yisra’el off of·earth of·¬north and off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬countries⁺ ¬whither they·were·¬expelled there and I·will·¬restore °them to °the ⁼earth of·them °which I·gave to·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·them

16 ¬¡see! I* I·mission·off °the⁺ ⁼¬fishermans⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼many⁺ says lord and they·will·¬fish °them and with °these⁺ I·will·mission·off °the⁺ ⁼many⁺ ⁼¬hunters⁺ and they·will·¬hunt °them ¬above of·all ⁼mountain and ¬above of·all ⁼¬hill and out of·the⁺ ⁼¬holes⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼rocks⁺

17 ¬that the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·me upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·them and not was·¬hidden the⁺ ⁼¬crimes⁺ of·them ¬opposite of·the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·me

18 and I·will·¬repay °¬doubles⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬unrighteousnesses⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·them upon to·which⁺ they·¬profaned °the ⁼earth of·me in to·the⁺ ⁼¬decaying·fleshes⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬abominations⁺ of·them and in to·the⁺ ⁼¬lawlessnesses⁺ of·them in to·which⁺ they·¬offended °the ⁼¬inheritance of·me

19 lord ¬strength of·me and ¬help of·me and ¬refuge of·me in to·day of·evils⁺ unto °you nations⁺ they·will·¬come off of·¬last of·the ⁼earth and they·will·¬say as °lying⁺ they·¬possessed·themselves the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·us °idols⁺ and not is in to·them ¬benefit

20 if will·do to·himself human °Gods⁺ and these⁺ not they·are Gods⁺

21 through °this ¬¡see! I* I·will·¬make·clear to·them in to·the ⁼¬time ⁼this °the ⁼hand of·me and I·will·make·known to·them °the ⁼ability of·me and they·will·know·themselves ¬that name to·me lord

5 ⁼¬cursed ⁼the ⁼human ⁼which °the ⁼¬hope has upon °human and will·¬establish °flesh of·arm of·him upon °him and off of·lord should·¬leave the ⁼heart of·him

6 and will·be·himself as the ⁼¬tamarisk ⁼the·one in to·the ⁼¬deserted not will·¬see·himself ¬when should·come the⁺ ⁼good⁺ and will·¬dwell in to·¬salty·lands⁺ and in to·¬deserted in to·earth ⁼¬brackish who not is·¬dwelled

7 and having·self-¬praised ⁼the ⁼human ⁼which has·¬persuaded upon to·the ⁼lord and will·be·himself lord ¬hope of·him

8 and will·be·himself as ¬wood ⁼¬prospering ¬from °waters⁺ and upon °¬moisture will·throw °roots⁺ of·him and not will·be·¬feared ¬when should·come ¬heat and will·be·himself upon to·him °¬sticks⁺ ⁼¬woodses⁺ in to·¬year of·¬drought not will·be·¬feared and not will·¬stop doing °fruit

9 ¬deep ⁼the ⁼heart ¬from °all⁺ and human is and what will·know·himself °him

10 I* lord ⁼¬chastising °hearts⁺ and ¬testing °¬kidneys⁺ of·the·one to·give to·¬each ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·him and ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼fruits⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬practices⁺ of·him

11 ¬called ¬partridge ¬assembled °which⁺ not ¬gave·birth·to doing °riches of·him not with of·judgment in to·¬half of·days⁺ of·him they·will·¬leave·behind °him and upon of·¬lasts⁺ of·him will·be·himself ¬foolish

12 ⁼throne of·¬glory self-¬lifting·up ¬sanctification of·us

13 ¬perseverance of·Yisra’el lord all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬leaving·behind °you ꜝlet·be⁺·¬dishonored having·¬left upon of·the ⁼earth ꜝlet·be⁺·written ¬that they·¬left·behind °¬flow of·life °the ⁼lord

14 ꜝ¬heal·yourself °me lord and I·will·be·¬healed ꜝ¬save °me and I·will·be·¬saved ¬that ¬pride of·me you you·are

15 ¬¡see! they they·say unto °me ¬where? is the ⁼saying of·lord ꜝlet·them·come

16 I* then not I·¬labored ¬following ¬after of·you and °day of·human not I·¬longed·for you you·should·¬know·yourself the⁺ ⁼self-¬departing through of·the⁺ ⁼lips⁺ of·me ¬before of·¬face of·you is

17 ńot you·should·be·been·generated to·me to °¬alienation self-¬sparing of·me in to·day ⁼¬evil

18 ꜝlet·be⁺·¬dishonored the⁺ ⁼¬pursuing °me and ńot may·I·be·¬dishonored I* may·they·be·¬frightened they and ńot may·I·be·¬frightened I* ꜝ¬bring·upon upon °them °day ⁼¬evil °¬double ⁼¬ruin ꜝ¬break °them

19 °¬these⁺ says lord ꜝ¬proceed and ꜝstand in to·gates⁺ of·sons⁺ of·people of·you in to·which⁺ they·¬enter·themselves in to·them kings⁺ of·Yudah and in to·which⁺ they·¬depart·themselves in to·them and in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·Yerushalam

20 and you·will·¬say unto °them ꜝhear⁺ °saying of·lord kings⁺ of·Yudah and all ⁼Yudaea and all ⁼Yerushalam the⁺ ⁼self-¬entering in to·the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ ⁼these⁺

21 °¬these⁺ says lord ꜝ¬keep⁺·yourselves⁺ °the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ of·you⁺ and ńot ꜝ¬take·up⁺ °¬burdens⁺ in to·the ⁼day of·the⁺ ⁼shabbats⁺ and ńot ꜝ¬depart⁺·yourselves⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·Yerushalam

22 and ńot ꜝ¬bring⁺ °¬burdens⁺ out of·houses⁺ of·you⁺ in to·the ⁼day of·the⁺ ⁼shabbats⁺ and °all ⁼work not you⁺·will·do ꜝmake·holy⁺ °the ⁼day of·the⁺ ⁼shabbats⁺ ¬as I·¬ordered·myself to·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ and not they·heard and not they·¬bowed °the ⁼ear of·them

23 and they·¬hardened °the ⁼neck of·them ¬above °the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·them of·the·one ńot to·hear of·me and of·the·one ńot to·self-¬receive °¬discipline

24 and will·be·himself ifᵮ to·hearsay you⁺·should·hear of·me says lord of·the·one ńot to·¬bring·in °¬burdens⁺ through of·the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·the ⁼city ⁼this in to·the ⁼day of·the⁺ ⁼shabbats⁺ and to·make·holy °the ⁼day of·the⁺ ⁼shabbats⁺ of·the·one ńot to·do °all ⁼work

25 and they·will·come·to·themselves through of·the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·the ⁼city ⁼this kings⁺ and ¬rulers⁺ ⁼self-¬sitting upon of·throne ⁼David and having·¬mounted upon to·¬chariots⁺ and to·horses⁺ of·them they and the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·them men⁺ of·Yudah and the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling °Yerushalam and will·be·¬settled the ⁼city ⁼this to °the ⁼eternity

26 and they·will·¬come out of·the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·Yudah and ¬around of·Yerushalam and out of·earth of·¬Benjamin and out of·the ⁼¬level and out of·the ⁼mountain and out of·the·one unto °¬south ¬bearing °¬burnt·offerings⁺ and °¬sacrifice and °¬incenses⁺ and °¬gift and °¬frankincense ¬bearing °¬praise to °house of·lord

27 and will·be·himself ifᵮ ńot you⁺·should·¬listen·to of·me of·the·one to·make·holy °the ⁼day of·the⁺ ⁼shabbats⁺ of·the·one ńot to·¬take·up °¬burdens⁺ and ńot to·self-¬enter to·the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·Yerushalam in to·the ⁼day of·the⁺ ⁼shabbats⁺ and I·will·¬set·fire °fire in to·the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·her and will·¬devour·himself °¬streets⁺ of·Yerushalam and not will·be·¬extinguished

18 the ⁼saying ⁼the ⁼self-generated ¬from of·lord unto °¬Jeremiah saying

2 ꜝ¬arise and ꜝ¬come to °house of·the ⁼¬potter and there you·will·hear·yourself °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me

3 and I·¬came to °the ⁼house of·the ⁼¬potter and ¬¡see! he did °work upon of·the⁺ ⁼stones⁺

4 and ¬failed °the ⁼¬jar which he did in to·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·him and ¬again he did °it ⁼¬jar ⁼óther ¬as ¬pleased ¬before of·him of·the·one to·do

5 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

6 if ¬as the ⁼¬potter ⁼this not I·will·be·able·myself of·the·one to·do °you⁺ house of·Yisra’el ¬¡see! as the ⁼¬clay of·the ⁼¬potter you⁺ you⁺·are in to·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·me

7 ¬end I·will·speak upon °nation or upon °kingdom of·the·one to·¬expel °them and of·the·one to·¬destroy

8 and should·be·¬turned the ⁼nation ⁼that off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼evils⁺ of·them and I·will·¬repent about of·the⁺ ⁼evils⁺ ⁼which⁺ I·¬counted·myself of·the·one to·do to·them

9 and ¬end I·will·speak upon °nation and upon °kingdom of·the·one to·self-¬rebuild and of·the·one to·self-¬plant

10 and they·should·do °the⁺ ⁼¬evils⁺ ¬in·front·of of·me of·the·one ńot to·hear of·the ⁼voice of·me and I·will·¬repent about of·the⁺ ⁼good⁺ ⁼which⁺ I·spoke of·the·one to·do to·them

11 and now ꜝtell unto °men⁺ of·Yudah and unto °the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling °Yerushalam ¬¡see! I* I·¬mold upon °you⁺ °evils⁺ and I·¬count·myself upon °you⁺ °¬thought ꜝlet·them·be·¬turned·away ¬so ¬each off of·¬road of·him of·the ⁼¬evil and °beautiful⁺ you⁺·will·do °the⁺ ⁼¬practices⁺ of·you⁺

12 and they·told we·will·¬act·like·a·man·ourselves ¬that ¬after of·the⁺ ⁼¬rejections⁺ of·us we·will·¬travel·ourselves and ¬each °the⁺ ⁼¬pleasings⁺ of·the ⁼heart of·him of·the ⁼¬evil we·will·do

13 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord ꜝ¬ask⁺ ¬so in to·nations⁺ what heard °¬such·as·thises⁺ ⁼¬cause·for·shudderings⁺ ⁼which⁺ did ¬very virgin of·Yisra’el

14 ńot they·will·¬fail off of·rock ¬breasts⁺ or ¬snow off of·the Libanou ńot will·¬turn·from water ¬forcibly to·¬wind self-¬bearing

15 ¬that they·¬forgot·themselves of·me the ⁼people of·me to °¬empty they·¬burned·incense and they·will·¬be·weak in to·the⁺ ⁼¬roads⁺ of·them ¬??? °eternal⁺ of·the·one to·be·¬mounted °¬paths⁺ not °having °¬road to °¬journey

16 of·the·one to·¬appoint °the ⁼earth of·them to °¬disappearance and °¬hissing ⁼eternal all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬going·through through of·her they·will·¬amaze·themselves and they·will·¬move °the ⁼head of·them

17 as °¬wind ⁼¬heat I·will·¬scatter °them ¬according·to °¬face of·¬enemies⁺ of·them I·will·¬show to·them °day of·¬destruction of·them

18 and they·told ¬come we·should·¬count·ourselves upon °¬Jeremiah ⁼¬thought ¬that not will·¬destroy·himself law off of·priest and ¬plan off of·¬intelligent and saying off of·¬prophet ¬come and we·should·¬strike °him in to·tongue and we·will·hear·ourselves °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·him

19 ꜝ¬listen·to of·me lord and ꜝ¬listen·to of·the ⁼voice of·the ⁼¬righteous·act of·me

20 if ¬repays·himself anti of·good⁺ evils⁺ ¬that they·¬talked·with °¬declarations⁺ ¬according·to of·the ⁼soul of·me and °the ⁼¬punishment of·them they·¬hid to·me ꜝbe·¬remembered of·having·stood of·me ¬according·to °¬face of·you of·the·one to·speak ¬above of·them °good⁺ of·the·one to·¬turn·away °the ⁼¬wrath of·you off of·them

21 through °this ꜝgive °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·them to °¬famine and ꜝ¬gather °them to °hands⁺ ⁼¬swords⁺ ꜝlet·be·generated⁺·themselves the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·them ¬childlesses⁺ and widows⁺ and the⁺ ⁼men⁺ of·them ꜝlet·be·generated⁺·themselves having·self-¬killed to·death and the⁺ ⁼youths⁺ of·them having·¬collapsed to·¬sword in to·¬war

22 ꜝlet·them·be·been·generated ¬shouting in to·the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·them you·will·¬bring·upon upon °them ⁼¬robbers⁺ ¬suddenly ¬that they·¬took·in·hand °saying to ¬??? of·me and °¬traps⁺ they·¬hid upon °me*

23 and you lord you·knew °¬all ⁼the ⁼¬plan of·them upon °me* to °death ńot you·should·¬acquit °the⁺ ⁼¬unrighteousnesses⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·them off of·¬face of·you ńot you·should·¬blot·out ꜝlet·them·be·generated·himself the ⁼¬weakness of·them ¬in·front·of of·you in to·¬time of·¬wrath of·you ꜝdo in to·them

19 ŧhen told lord unto °me ꜝ¬proceed and ꜝ¬possess·yourself °¬pitcher ⁼having·self-¬molded ⁼¬clay and you·will·¬bring off of·the⁺ ⁼¬elders⁺ of·the ⁼people and off of·the⁺ ⁼¬elders⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼priests⁺

2 and you·will·come·out·yourself to °the ⁼¬cemetery of·sons⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·them which is upon of·the⁺ ⁼¬thresholds⁺ of·gate ⁼the·one ¬??? and ꜝ¬read there °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼which⁺ iᵮ I·will·speak unto °you

3 and you·will·¬say to·them ꜝhear⁺ °the ⁼saying of·lord kings⁺ of·Yudah and men⁺ of·Yudah and the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling °Yerushalam and the⁺ ⁼self-¬entering in to·the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ ⁼these⁺ °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼the ⁼God of·Yisra’el ¬¡see! 4 anti of·which⁺ they·¬left·behind °me and they·¬alienated °the ⁼¬place ⁼this and they·¬burned·incense in to·him to·Gods⁺ ⁼¬another'ses⁺ ⁼which⁺ not they·had·¬seen they and the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·them and the⁺ ⁼kings⁺ of·Yudah they·¬filled °the ⁼¬place ⁼this of·bloods⁺ ⁼¬innocents⁺

5 and they·¬built °¬highs⁺ to·the ⁼¬Baal of·the·one to·¬burn °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·them in to·fire °which⁺ not I·¬ordered·myself not·then I·spoke not·then I·was·¬considered in to·the ⁼heart of·me

6 through °this ¬¡see! days⁺ they·come·themselves says lord and not will·be·called to·the ⁼¬place ⁼this ¬still ¬downfall and ¬cemetery of·son Ennom but or ¬cemetery of·the ⁼¬slaughter

7 and I·will·¬slaughter °the ⁼¬plan of·Yudah and °the ⁼¬plan of·Yerushalam in to·the ⁼¬place ⁼this and I·will·¬lay °them in to·¬sword ¬in·front·of of·the⁺ ⁼¬enemies⁺ of·them and in to·hands⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬seeking °the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ of·them and I·will·give °the⁺ ⁼corpses⁺ of·them to °¬eating to·the⁺ ⁼winglings⁺ of·the ⁼heaven and to·the⁺ ⁼¬wild·animals⁺ of·the ⁼earth

8 and I·will·¬appoint °the ⁼city ⁼this to °¬disappearance and to °¬hissing all ⁼the ⁼self-¬passing·by upon of·her will·¬look·downcast and will·¬hiss ¬above of·all ⁼the ⁼¬plague of·her

9 and they·will·¬eat·themselves °the⁺ ⁼fleshes⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼fleshes⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·them and ¬each °the⁺ ⁼fleshes⁺ of·the ⁼¬neighbor of·him they·will·¬eat·themselves in to·the ⁼¬passage and in to·the ⁼¬assault ⁼which they·will·¬assault °them the⁺ ⁼¬enemies⁺ of·them

10 and you·will·¬break °the ⁼¬pitcher ¬according·to °¬eyes⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬departing with of·you

11 and you·will·¬say °¬these⁺ says lord thus I·will·¬break °the ⁼people ⁼this and °the ⁼city ⁼this ¬as ¬breaks·himself °¬vessel °¬clay which not will·be·able·himself to·be·¬healed ¬still

12 thus I·will·do says lord to·the ⁼¬place ⁼this and to·the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling in to·him of·the·one to·be·given °the ⁼city ⁼this as °the ⁼¬failing

13 and the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·Yerushalam and the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·kings⁺ of·Yudah they·will·be·themselves ¬as the ⁼¬place ⁼the ⁼¬failing of·the⁺ ⁼¬impurities⁺ in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ in to·which⁺ they·¬burned·incense upon of·the⁺ ⁼¬rooftops⁺ of·them to·all ⁼the ⁼¬army of·the ⁼heaven and they·¬poured·a·libation °¬libations⁺ to·Gods⁺ ⁼¬another'ses⁺

14 and came ¬Jeremiah off of·the ⁼¬downfall ¬whither missioned·off °him lord there of·the·one to·¬prophesy and stood in to·the ⁼¬palace of·house ⁼lord and ꜝtell unto °all ⁼the ⁼people

15 °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! I* I·¬bring·upon upon °the ⁼city ⁼this and upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·her and upon °the⁺ ⁼¬villages⁺ of·her °¬alls⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼evils⁺ ⁼which⁺ I·spoke upon °her ¬that they·¬hardened °the ⁼neck of·them of·the·one ńot to·¬listen·to of·the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me

20 and heard Paschōr ⁼son Emmēr the ⁼priest and this was having·self-¬appointed ⁼self-¬governing of·house ⁼lord ⁼the ⁼¬Jeremiah ⁼¬prophesying °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼these⁺

2 and ¬struck °him and threw·in °him to °the ⁼¬dungeon which was in to·gate of·house ⁼having·self-¬left of·the ⁼¬upper·room which was in to·house of·lord

3 and ¬led·out Paschōr °the ⁼¬Jeremiah out of·the ⁼¬dungeon and told to·him ¬Jeremiah ¬not! Paschōr called lord °the ⁼name of·you but or °¬refugee

4 ¬because °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! I* I·give °you to °¬displacement wiŧh to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬friends⁺ of·you and they·will·¬collapse·themselves in to·¬sword of·¬enemies⁺ of·them and the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·you they·will·¬see·themselves and °you and °all ⁼Yudah I·will·give to °hands⁺ of·king of·¬Babylon and they·will·¬deport °them and they·will·¬cut °them in to·¬swords⁺

5 and I·will·give °the ⁼all ⁼¬strength of·the ⁼city ⁼this and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬travails⁺ of·her and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼treasures⁺ of·the ⁼king ⁼Yudah to °hands⁺ of·¬enemies⁺ of·him and they·will·¬bring °them to °¬Babylon

6 and you and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling in to·the ⁼house of·you you⁺·will·¬travel·yourselves⁺ in to·¬captivity and in to·¬Babylon you·will·die·off·yourself and there you·will·¬bury·yourself you and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬friends⁺ of·you to·which⁺ you·¬prophesied to·them °lying⁺

7 you·¬tricked °me lord and I·was·¬tricked you·¬grasped and you·were·been·able I·was·generated·myself to °¬laughter °all ⁼day I·¬continued ¬mocked

8 ¬that to·¬bitter ⁼saying of·me I·will·¬laugh·myself °¬rebellion and °¬misery I·will·¬call·myself ¬that was·been·generated saying of·lord to °¬reproach to·me* and to °¬taunting °all ⁼day of·me

9 and I·told not ńot I·will·name °the ⁼name of·lord and not ńot I·will·speak ¬still upon to·the ⁼name of·him and was·generated·himself as fire ⁼self-¬kindling ⁼¬blazing in to·the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·me and I·have·¬neglected·myself ¬from·all·sides and not I·am·able·myself to·¬bear

10 ¬that I·heard °¬fault of·many⁺ ⁼self-¬assembling ¬around ꜝ¬rise·up·together·against⁺ and we·should·¬rise·up·together·against to·him all⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼¬friends⁺ of·him ꜝ¬keep⁺ °the ⁼¬thought of·him if will·be·¬tricked and we·will·be·able·ourselves to·him and we·will·take·ourselves °the ⁼¬vengeance of·us out of·him

11 and lord with myˊ ¬as ¬warrior of·¬strengths⁺ through °this they·¬pursued and to·¬understand not they·were·able·themselves they·were·¬been·ashamed ¬very ¬that not they·¬understanded °¬dishonours⁺ of·them which⁺ through of·eternity not they·will·be·¬forgotten

12 lord ¬testing °¬justs⁺ ¬understanding °¬kidneys⁺ and °hearts⁺ may·I·¬see °the·one ¬from of·you °¬vengeance in to·them ¬that unto °you I·¬revealed °the⁺ ⁼¬pleas⁺ of·me

13 ꜝ¬sing⁺ to·the ⁼lord ꜝ¬praise⁺ to·him ¬that ¬took·out·himself °soul of·¬poor out of·hand of·self-¬acting·wickedly

14 ¬cursed ⁼the ⁼day in to·which I·was·¬given·birth·to in to·her the ⁼day in to·which ¬gave·birth·to °me the ⁼mother of·me ńot ꜝlet·them·be ¬longed·for

15 ¬cursed ⁼the ⁼human ⁼the ⁼self-¬announcing to·the ⁼father of·me saying was·¬given·birth·to to·you virulent self-¬celebrating

16 ꜝlet·them·be the ⁼human ⁼that as the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ °which⁺ ¬overturned lord in to·¬wrath and not was·¬repented ꜝlet·them·hear of·¬shouting °the·one ¬early and of·¬shout of·¬noon

17 ¬that not killed·off °me in to·motherhood of·mother and was·generated·himself to·me the ⁼mother of·me ¬grave of·me and the ⁼motherhood ¬??? of·eternal

18 so·that °what ⁼this they·came·out out of·motherhood of·the·one to·look °¬labors⁺ and °¬travails⁺ and they·¬continued in to·¬shame the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·me

21 the ⁼saying ⁼the ⁼self-generated ¬from of·lord unto °¬Jeremiah when missioned·off unto °him the ⁼king Sedekias °the Paschōr ⁼son Melchiou and Sofonian ⁼son Maasaiou °the ⁼priest saying

2 ꜝ¬question about of·us °the ⁼lord ¬that king of·¬Babylon has·¬approached upon °us if will·do lord ¬according·to °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬marvelouses⁺ of·him and will·come·off·himself off of·us

3 and told unto °them ¬Jeremiah thus you⁺·will·¬say unto Sedekian ⁼king of·Yudah

4 °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! I* I·¬change °the⁺ ⁼¬weapons⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬warfares⁺ in to·which⁺ you⁺ you⁺·¬fight in to·them unto °the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·¬confined °you⁺ ¬outside of·the ⁼wall to °the ⁼¬midst of·the ⁼city ⁼this

5 and I·will·¬fight I* °you⁺ in to·hand ⁼having·self-¬stretched·out and in to·arm ⁼¬mighty with of·¬wrath and of·¬wrath and of·¬anger ⁼great

6 and I·will·¬strike °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling in to·the ⁼city ⁼this °the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ in to·death ⁼great and they·will·die·off·themselves

7 and with °these⁺ thus says lord I·will·give °the Sedekian ⁼king of·Yudah and °the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·him and °the ⁼people ⁼the ⁼¬left·behind in to·the ⁼city ⁼this off of·the ⁼death and off of·the ⁼¬famine and off of·the ⁼¬sword to °hands⁺ of·¬enemies⁺ of·them ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬seeking °the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ of·them and they·will·¬cut °them in to·mouth of·¬sword not I·will·¬spare·myself upon to·them and not ńot I·will·¬have·compassion °them

8 and unto °the ⁼people ⁼this you·will·¬say °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! I* I·have·given ¬before of·¬face of·you⁺ °the ⁼¬road of·the ⁼life and °the ⁼¬road of·the ⁼death

9 the ⁼self-¬sitting in to·the ⁼city ⁼this will·die·off·himself in to·¬sword and in to·¬famine and the ⁼self-¬departing to·¬join·with unto °the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·¬confined °you⁺ will·live·himself and will·be·himself the ⁼soul of·him to °¬plunders⁺ and will·live·himself

10 ¬because I·have·¬established °the ⁼¬face of·me upon °the ⁼city ⁼this to °evils⁺ and not to °good⁺ to °hands⁺ of·king of·¬Babylon will·be·¬delivered and will·¬burn °her in to·fire

11 the ⁼house of·king ⁼Yudah ꜝhear⁺ °saying of·lord

12 house of·David °¬these⁺ says lord ꜝjudge⁺ °the·one ¬early °judgment and ꜝ¬guide⁺ and ꜝ¬take·out⁺·yourselves⁺ °self-¬robbing out of·hand of·¬harming °him ¬that ńot should·be·¬set·fire as fire the ⁼¬wrath of·me and will·be·¬kindled and not will·be·himself the ⁼going·to·¬extinguish

13 ¬¡see! I* unto °you °the ⁼¬dwelling °the ⁼¬cavity of·¬Tyre °the ⁼¬level °the⁺ ⁼saying what will·¬frighten °us or what will·come·to·himself unto °the ⁼¬dwelling·place of·us

14 and I·will·¬set·fire °fire in to·the ⁼¬grove of·her and will·¬eat·himself °all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬surrounding of·her

22 °¬these⁺ says lord ꜝ¬travel·yourself and ꜝ¬come to °the ⁼house of·the ⁼king ⁼Yudah and you·will·speak there °the ⁼saying ⁼this

2 and you·will·¬say ꜝhear °saying of·lord king of·Yudah the ⁼self-¬sitting upon of·throne ⁼David you and the ⁼house of·you and the ⁼people of·you and the⁺ ⁼self-¬entering to·the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ ⁼these⁺

3 °¬these⁺ says lord ꜝdo⁺ °judgment and °¬justice and you⁺·¬take·out·yourselves⁺ °¬robbed out of·hand of·¬harming °him and °¬proselyte and °orphan and °widow ńot ꜝ¬oppress⁺ and ńot ꜝ¬be·ungodly⁺ and °blood ⁼¬innocent ńot you⁺·should·¬pour·out in to·the ⁼¬place ⁼this

4 ¬because ifᵮ doing you⁺·should·do °the ⁼saying ⁼this and they·will·come·to·themselves in to·the⁺ ⁼gates⁺ of·the ⁼house ⁼this kings⁺ ⁼self-¬sitting upon of·throne ⁼David and having·¬mounted upon of·¬chariots⁺ and of·horses⁺ they and the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·them and the ⁼people of·them

5 ifᵮ then ńot you⁺·should·do °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼these⁺ ¬according·to of·myself I·¬sweared says lord ¬that to °¬devastation will·be·himself the ⁼house ⁼this

6 ¬that °¬these⁺ says lord ¬according·to of·the ⁼house ⁼king ⁼Yudah Galaad you to·me ¬beginning of·the Libanou ifᵮ ńot I·should·¬place °you to °¬deserted °cities⁺ ńot °having·been·¬dwelled

7 and I·will·¬bring·upon upon °you °man ⁼¬destroying and °the ⁼¬hewing·axe of·him and they·will·¬prevent °the⁺ ⁼¬selects⁺ ⁼¬Kidrons⁺ of·you and they·will·throw·in to °the ⁼fire

8 and they·will·¬pass·through·themselves nations⁺ through of·the ⁼city ⁼this and they·will·¬say ¬each unto °the ⁼¬neighbor of·him through °what did lord thus to·the ⁼city ⁼the ⁼great ⁼this

9 and they·will·¬say anti of·which⁺ they·¬left·behind °the ⁼¬covenant of·lord ⁼God of·them and they·¬worshipped to·Gods⁺ ⁼¬another'ses⁺ and they·served to·them

10 ńot ꜝ¬weep⁺ °the ⁼having·died ńot·then ꜝ¬lament⁺ °him ꜝ¬weep⁺ to·¬weeping °the ⁼self-¬departing ¬that not will·¬turn ¬still and not ńot should·¬see °the ⁼earth of·fatherland of·him

11 ¬because °¬these⁺ says lord upon Sellēm ⁼son of·¬Josiah °the ⁼becoming·king anti of·¬Josiah ⁼the ⁼father of·him which came·out out of·the ⁼¬place ⁼this not will·¬live there ¬not·any·more

12 but or in to·the ⁼¬place ¬whither I·¬deported °him there will·die·off·himself and °the ⁼earth ⁼this not will·¬see·himself ¬still

13 ¬oh! the ⁼¬building °house of·him not with of·¬justice and °the⁺ ⁼¬upper·rooms⁺ of·him not in to·judgment ¬from to·the ⁼¬neighbor of·him works·himself °¬free·gift and °the ⁼¬wage of·him not ńot will·¬pay to·him

14 you·¬built to·yourself °house ⁼¬well-proportioned °¬upper·rooms⁺ ⁼¬ventilateds⁺ ⁼having·been·¬given·orders to·¬windows⁺ and °having·been·¬boarded in to·¬Kidron and °having·been·christened in to·¬vermilion

15 ńot you·should·become·king ¬that you you·¬provoke·yourself in to·¬Ahaz to·the ⁼father of·you not they·will·¬eat·themselves and not they·will·drink·themselves ¬better was °you to·do °judgment and °¬justice ⁼beautiful

16 not they·knew not they·judged °judgment to·¬lowly not·then °judgment of·¬poor not this is the·one ńot to·know °you °me* says lord

17 ¬¡see! not they·are the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·you not·then the ⁼heart of·you beautiful but to °the ⁼¬greediness of·you and to °the ⁼blood ⁼the ⁼¬innocent of·the·one to·¬pour·out °it and to °¬crime and to °murder of·the·one to·do

18 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord upon Iōakim ⁼son of·¬Josiah °king of·Yudah ¬woe! upon °the ⁼man ⁼this not ńot they·should·chop·themselves °him ¬oh! brother not·then ńot they·will·¬weep·themselves °him ¬alas! lord

19 °¬burial of·donkey will·be·¬buried ¬scraped·away will·be·¬thrown ¬beyond of·the ⁼gate ⁼Yerushalam

20 ꜝ¬ascend to °the ⁼¬frankincense and ꜝhave·¬cried and to °the Basan ꜝgive °the ⁼voice of·you and ꜝ¬cry·out to °the·one ¬other·side of·the ⁼sea ¬that they·were·¬broken all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬lovers⁺ of·you

21 I·spoke unto °you in to·the ⁼¬transgression of·you and you·told not I·will·hear·myself this ⁼the ⁼¬road of·you out of·youth of·you not you·heard of·the ⁼voice of·me

22 °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬flocksmans⁺ of·you will·¬flocksman ¬wind and the⁺ ⁼¬lovers⁺ of·you in to·¬captivity they·will·come·out·themselves ¬that ŧhen you·will·be·¬been·ashamed and you·will·be·¬disgraced off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬befriending °you

23 ¬dwelling in to·the ⁼¬frankincense ¬nesting in to·the⁺ ⁼¬Kidrons⁺ you·will·¬groan in to·the·one to·come to·you of·¬labor as of·¬giving·birth·to

24 I·live I* says lord ifᵮ self-generated should·be·generated·himself ¬Jechoniah ⁼son Iōakim king of·Yudah ¬seal upon of·the ⁼hand ⁼the ⁼¬right of·me ¬from·there I·will·¬pull·out °you

25 and I·will·¬deliver °you to °hands⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬seeking °the ⁼soul of·you of·which⁺ you you·¬revere·yourself off of·¬face of·them to °hands⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺

26 and I·will·¬throw·off °you and °the ⁼mother of·you °the ⁼¬giving·birth·to °you to °earth ¬whither not you·were·¬given·birth·to there and there you⁺·will·die·off·yourselves⁺

27 to then °the ⁼earth ⁼which they they·¬pray·themselves to·the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ of·them not ńot they·should·¬turn·away

28 was·¬disgraced ¬Jechoniah as ¬vessel of·which not is ¬need of·him ¬that was·¬cast·forth and was·thrown·out to °earth ⁼which not had·¬seen

29 earth ⁼earth ꜝhear °saying of·lord

30 ꜝwrite °the ⁼man ⁼this ⁼¬banished ⁼human ¬that not ńot should·be·¬grown out of·the ⁼seed of·him man ⁼self-¬sitting upon of·throne ⁼David ¬·first ¬still in to·the ⁼Yudah

23 ¬oh! the⁺ ⁼¬flocksmans⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬scattering and ¬destroying °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ of·the ⁼¬pasture of·me

2 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord upon °the⁺ ⁼¬flocksmaning °the ⁼people of·me you⁺ you⁺·¬scattered °the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ of·me and ꜝ¬expel⁺ °them and not you⁺·¬visitted·yourselves⁺ °them ¬¡see! I* I·will·¬avenge upon °you⁺ ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼¬evils⁺ ⁼¬practices⁺ of·you⁺

3 and I* I·will·¬receive·myself °the⁺ ⁼¬remainings⁺ of·the ⁼people of·me off of·all ⁼the ⁼earth ¬whither I·¬expelled °them there and I·will·¬appoint °them to °the ⁼¬pasture of·them and they·will·be·¬grown and they·will·be·¬multiplied

4 and I·will·¬arise to·them °¬flocksmans⁺ which⁺ they·will·¬flocksman °them and not they·will·be·¬feared ¬still not·then they·will·be·¬frightened says lord

5 ¬¡see! days⁺ they·come·themselves says lord and I·will·¬arise to·the ⁼David °¬east ⁼¬just and will·become·king king and will·¬understand and will·do °judgment and °¬justice upon of·the ⁼earth

6 in to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·him will·be·¬saved Yudah and Yisra’el will·¬dwell having·¬persuaded and this ⁼the ⁼name of·him which will·call °him lord Iōsedek

9 in to·the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ was·¬broken the ⁼heart of·me in to·me* was·¬shaken all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼bones⁺ of·me I·was·been·generated as man ⁼having·self-¬broken and as human ⁼self-¬holding off of·wine off of·¬face of·lord and off of·¬face of·¬beauty ⁼¬glory of·him

10 ¬that off of·¬face of·these⁺ ¬mourned the ⁼earth they·were·dried·up the⁺ ⁼¬pastures⁺ of·the ⁼¬deserted and was·generated·himself the ⁼¬racecourse of·them ¬evil and the ⁼¬strength of·them not thus

11 ¬that priest and ¬prophet they·were·¬defiled and in to·the ⁼house of·me I·¬saw °¬evils⁺ of·them

12 through °this ꜝlet·them·be·generated·himself the ⁼¬road of·them to·them to °¬slip in to·¬darkness and they·will·be·¬tripped·up and they·will·¬collapse·themselves in to·her ¬because I·will·¬bring·upon upon °them °evils⁺ in to·¬year of·¬review of·them ¬asserts lord

13 and in to·the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ of·¬Samaria I·¬saw °¬violation·of·laws⁺ they·¬prophesied through of·the ⁼¬Baal and they·¬led·astray °the ⁼people of·me °Yisra’el

14 and in to·the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ of·Yerushalam I·have·¬seen °¬cause·for·shudderings⁺ °self-adulterizing and °self-¬travelling in to·lying⁺ and °self-¬helping of·hands⁺ of·¬evils⁺ of·the·one ńot to·be·¬turned·away °¬each off of·the ⁼¬road of·him of·the ⁼¬evil they·were·been·generated to·me all⁺ as ¬Sodom and the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling °her ¬just·as ¬Gomorrah

15 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! I* I·will·¬feed °them °¬anguish and I·will·¬water °them °water ⁼¬bitter ¬that off of·the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ of·Yerushalam came·out ¬defilement to·all ⁼the ⁼earth

16 thus says lord ⁼¬almighty ńot ꜝhear⁺ °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ ¬that they·¬make·futile to·¬selves⁺ °¬appearance off of·heart of·them they·speak and not off of·mouth of·lord

17 they·say to·the⁺ ⁼self-¬rejecting °the ⁼saying of·lord peace will·be·himself to·you⁺ and to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬travelling to·the⁺ ⁼¬wills⁺ of·them to·all ⁼the ⁼self-¬travelling to·¬error of·heart of·him they·told not will·¬come upon °you evils⁺

18 ¬that what stood in to·¬garrison of·lord and ¬saw °the ⁼saying of·him what ¬listened·to·himself and heard

19 ¬¡see! ¬earthquake ¬from of·lord and ¬wrath ¬departs·himself to °¬quaking self-¬gathering upon °the⁺ ⁼¬ungodlies⁺ will·¬come

20 and ¬not·any·more will·¬turn·away the ⁼¬wrath of·lord ¬until iᵮ should·do °it and ¬until iᵮ should·¬arise °it off of·¬enterprise of·heart of·him upon of·¬last of·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ they·will·¬understand °them

21 not I·missioned·off °the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ and they they·¬ran not I·spoke unto °them and they they·¬prophesied

22 and if they·stood in to·the ⁼¬confidence of·me and they·¬listened·to of·the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me and °the ⁼people of·me iᵮ they·¬turned·away °them off of·the⁺ ⁼¬evils⁺ ⁼¬practices⁺ of·them

23 God ⁼¬coming·near I* I·am says lord and ¬not! God ¬afar·off

24 if will·be·¬hidden human in to·¬hiddens⁺ and I* not I·will·¬see·myself °him ńot ¬not! °the ⁼heaven and °the ⁼earth I* I·will·¬fulfill says lord

25 I·heard °which⁺ they·speak the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ °which⁺ they·¬prophesy upon to·the ⁼name of·me °lying⁺ saying I·¬dreamed·myself °¬dream

26 ¬until ¬when? will·be·himself in to·heart of·the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬prophesying °lying⁺ and in to·the·one to·¬prophesy °them °the⁺ ⁼¬wills⁺ of·heart of·them

27 ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬counting of·the·one to·self-¬forget of·the ⁼law of·me in to·the⁺ ⁼¬dreams⁺ of·them °which⁺ they·¬related·fully·themselves ¬each to·the ⁼¬neighbor of·him ¬just·as they·¬forgot·themselves the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·them of·the ⁼name of·me in to·the ⁼¬Baal

28 the ⁼¬prophet in to·which the ⁼¬dream is ꜝlet·them·¬relate·fully·himself °the ⁼¬dream of·him and in to·which the ⁼saying of·me unto °him ꜝlet·them·¬relate·fully·himself °the ⁼saying of·me upon of·¬truth °what ⁼the ⁼¬chaff unto °the ⁼¬grain thus the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me says lord

29 ¬not! the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me ¬just·as fire ⁼¬blazing says lord and as ¬hewing·axe ⁼chopping °rock

30 through °this ¬¡see! I* unto °the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ says lord ⁼the ⁼God °the⁺ ⁼thieving ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me ¬each ¬from of·the ⁼¬neighbor of·him

32 ¬¡see! I* unto °the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬prophesying °¬dreams⁺ ⁼lying⁺ and they·¬related·fully·themselves °them and they·¬led·astray °the ⁼people of·me in to·the⁺ ⁼lying⁺ of·them and in to·the⁺ ⁼¬deceivings⁺ of·them and I* not I·missioned·off °them and not I·¬ordered·myself to·them and °¬advantage not they·will·¬help °the ⁼people ⁼this

33 and ifᵮ they·should·¬ask °you the ⁼people ⁼this or priest or ¬prophet ⁼saying what ⁼the ⁼¬concern of·lord and you·will·¬say to·them you⁺ you⁺·are the ⁼¬concern and I·will·¬dash·down °you⁺ says lord

34 and the ⁼¬prophet and the ⁼priest and the ⁼people which⁺ iᵮ they·should·tell ¬concern of·lord and I·will·¬avenge °the ⁼human ⁼that and °the ⁼house of·him

38 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼the ⁼God anti of·which⁺ you⁺·told °the ⁼saying ⁼this ¬concern of·lord and I·missioned·off unto °you⁺ saying not you⁺·will·¬say ¬concern of·lord

39 through °this ¬¡see! I* I·take and I·¬dash·down °you⁺ and °the ⁼city ⁼which I·gave to·you⁺ and to·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺

40 and I·will·give upon °you⁺ °¬reproach ⁼eternal and °¬dishonour ⁼eternal who not will·be·¬forgotten

7 through °this ¬¡see! days⁺ they·come·themselves says lord and not they·will·¬say ¬still lives lord ⁼which ¬led °the ⁼house of·Yisra’el out of·earth ⁼Egypt

8 but lives lord ⁼which ¬assembled °¬all ⁼the ⁼seed of·Yisra’el off of·earth of·¬north and off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬countries⁺ ¬whither ¬expelled °them there and ¬restored °them to °the ⁼earth of·them

24 ¬showed to·me lord two °¬reed·baskets⁺ of·¬fig·trees⁺ °self-¬laying ¬according·to °¬face of·temple ⁼lord with °the·one to·¬exile Nabouchodonosor ⁼king of·¬Babylon °the ⁼¬Jechoniah ⁼son Iōakim °king of·Yudah and °the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬craftsmans⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬prisoners⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼riches⁺ out of·Yerushalam and ¬brought °them to °¬Babylon

2 the ⁼¬reed·basket ⁼the ⁼one of·¬fig·trees⁺ ⁼¬goods⁺ ¬very as the⁺ ⁼¬figs⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬early·rains⁺ and the ⁼¬reed·basket ⁼the ⁼óther of·¬fig·trees⁺ ⁼¬evils⁺ ¬very which⁺ not will·be·¬eaten off of·¬evil of·them

3 and told lord unto °me °what you you·¬see ¬Jeremiah and I·told °¬figs⁺ the⁺ ⁼¬goods⁺ ⁼¬goods⁺ ¬greatly and the⁺ ⁼¬evils⁺ ⁼¬evils⁺ ¬greatly which⁺ not will·be·¬eaten off of·¬evil of·them

4 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °me saying

5 °¬these⁺ says lord ⁼the ⁼God of·Yisra’el as °the⁺ ⁼¬figs⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬goods⁺ ⁼these⁺ thus I·will·¬come·to·know·myself °the⁺ ⁼¬exiled of·Yudah °which⁺ I·have·¬sended·out out of·the ⁼¬place ⁼this to °earth of·¬Chaldeans⁺ to °good⁺

6 and I·will·¬establish °the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·me upon °them to °good⁺ and I·will·¬restore °them to °the ⁼earth ⁼this to °good⁺ and I·will·¬rebuild °them and not ńot I·should·¬take·down and I·will·¬plant °them and not ńot I·¬pluck·out

7 and I·will·give to·them °heart of·the·one to·have·¬seen °them °me* ¬that I* I·am lord and they·will·be·themselves to·me to °people and I* I·will·be·myself to·them to °God ¬that they·will·be·¬turned upon °me* out of·¬all ⁼the ⁼heart of·them

8 and as °the⁺ ⁼¬figs⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬evils⁺ ⁼which⁺ not will·be·¬eaten off of·¬evil of·them °¬these⁺ says lord thus I·will·¬deliver °the Sedekian ⁼king of·Yudah and °the⁺ ⁼¬great·mans⁺ of·him and °the ⁼¬remaining of·Yerushalam °the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬left in to·the ⁼earth ⁼this and °the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling in to·Egypt

9 and I·will·give °them to °¬exile to °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼kingdoms⁺ of·the ⁼earth and they·will·be·themselves to °¬reproach and to °¬parable and to °¬hatred and to °¬curse in to·all ⁼¬place ¬whither I·¬expelled °them there

10 and I·will·mission·off to °them °the ⁼¬famine and °the ⁼death and °the ⁼¬sword ¬until iᵮ they·should·¬fail off of·the ⁼earth ⁼which I·gave to·them

25 the ⁼saying ⁼the ⁼self-generated unto °¬Jeremiah upon °all ⁼the ⁼people of·Yudah in to·the ⁼year ⁼the ⁼fourth of·the Iōakim ⁼son ⁼¬Josiah ⁼king ⁼Yudah

2 °which spoke unto °all ⁼the ⁼people of·Yudah and unto °the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling °Yerushalam saying

3 in to·¬thirteenth ⁼year of·¬Josiah ⁼son ⁼¬Amos ⁼king ⁼Yudah and ¬until of·the ⁼day ⁼this twenty and °three⁺ ⁼years⁺ and I·spoke unto °you⁺ ¬rising·at·dawn and saying

4 and I·missioned·off unto °you⁺ °the⁺ ⁼servants⁺ of·me °the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ of·¬dawn missioning·off and not you⁺·¬listened·to and not you⁺·¬watched·out to·the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·you⁺

5 saying ꜝ¬turn·away⁺ ¬each off of·the ⁼¬road of·him of·the ⁼¬evil and off of·the⁺ ⁼¬evils⁺ ⁼¬practices⁺ of·you⁺ and you⁺·will·¬dwell upon of·the ⁼earth ⁼which I·gave to·you⁺ and to·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ off of·eternity and ¬until of·eternity

6 ńot you⁺·should·¬travel·yourselves⁺ ¬after of·Gods⁺ ⁼¬another'ses⁺ of·the·one to·serve to·them and of·the·one to·¬worship to·them ¬that ńot you⁺·should·¬anger °me in to·the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·you⁺ of·the·one to·do·evil °you⁺

7 and not you⁺·heard of·me

8 through °this °¬these⁺ says lord ¬since not you⁺·trusted to·the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me

9 ¬¡see! I* I·mission·off and I·will·take·myself °the ⁼paternity off of·¬north and I·will·¬bring °them upon °the ⁼earth ⁼this and upon °the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling °her and upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬surrounding of·her and I·will·¬make·desolate °them and I·will·give °them to °¬disappearance and to °¬hissing and to °¬reproach ⁼eternal

10 and I·will·¬destroy off of·them °voice of·¬joy and °voice of·¬joy °voice of·bridegroom and °voice of·bride °¬aroma of·myrrh and °light of·¬lamp

11 and will·be·himself all ⁼the ⁼earth to °¬disappearance and they·will·serve in to·the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ seventy °years⁺

12 and in to·the·one to·be·¬fulfilled °the·ones⁺ seventy °years⁺ I·will·¬avenge °the ⁼nation ⁼that ¬asserts lord and I·will·¬place·myself °them to °¬disappearance ⁼eternal

13 and I·will·¬bring·upon upon °the ⁼earth ⁼that °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me °which⁺ I·spoke ¬according·to of·her °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·self-written in to·the ⁼¬scroll ⁼this

14 °which⁺ ¬prophesied ¬Jeremiah upon °the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬Elamites⁺

15 ⁼¬these⁺ says lord ꜝlet·them·be·¬broken °the ⁼¬bow of·¬Elamite ¬beginning of·¬command of·them

16 and I·will·¬bring·upon upon °¬Elamite °four⁺ ⁼¬winds⁺ out of·the⁺ ⁼four⁺ ⁼¬ends⁺ of·the ⁼heaven and I·will·¬scatter °them in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬winds⁺ ⁼these⁺ and not will·be·himself °nation which not will·¬come there the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬expelled of·¬Elamite

17 and I·will·¬frighten °them ¬in·front·of of·the⁺ ⁼¬enemies⁺ of·them ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬seeking °the ⁼soul of·them and I·will·¬bring·upon upon °them °evils⁺ ¬according·to °the ⁼¬wrath of·the ⁼¬wrath of·me and I·will·¬send·as·successor ¬after of·them °the ⁼¬sword of·me ¬until of·the·one to·¬consume °them

18 and I·will·¬place °the ⁼throne of·me in to·¬Elamite and I·will·¬send·out ¬from·there °king and °¬great·mans⁺

19 and will·be·himself upon of·¬last of·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ I·will·¬turn·away °the ⁼¬captivity of·¬Elamite says lord

20 in to·¬beginning of·becoming·king Sedekiou ⁼the ⁼king was·generated·himself the ⁼saying ⁼this about °¬Elamite

2 to·the ⁼Egypt upon °ability of·¬Pharaoh Nechaō ⁼king of·Egypt which was upon to·the ⁼¬river ⁼¬Euphrates in ¬??? °which ¬struck Nabouchodonosor ⁼king of·¬Babylon in to·the ⁼year to·the ⁼fourth Iōakim ⁼king ⁼Yudah

3 ꜝ¬take·up⁺ °¬weapons⁺ and °asps⁺ and ꜝ¬bring·near⁺ to °¬war

4 ꜝ¬saddle⁺ °the⁺ ⁼horses⁺ ꜝbe⁺·¬mounted the⁺ ⁼horsemen⁺ and ꜝ¬appoint⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼¬helmets⁺ of·you⁺ ꜝ¬put·forth⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬wooden·spears⁺ and ꜝ¬put·on⁺·yourselves⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬breastplates⁺ of·you⁺

5 °what ¬that they they·¬frighten·themselves and they·¬leave ¬after ¬because the⁺ ⁼¬strongs⁺ of·them they·will·be·chopped to·¬flight they·¬fled and not they·¬lived self-¬containing ¬around says lord

6 ńot ꜝlet·them·¬flee the ⁼¬light and ńot ꜝlet·them·¬escape·himself the ⁼¬strong upon °¬north °the·ones⁺ ¬from °the ⁼¬Euphrates they·¬were·weak they·have·¬collapsed

7 what ⁼this as ¬river will·¬ascend·himself and as ¬rivers⁺ they·¬swell·up °water

8 °waters⁺ of·Egypt ¬like ¬river will·¬ascend·himself and told I·will·¬ascend·myself and I·will·¬cover °earth and I·will·¬destroy °¬dwelling in to·her

9 ꜝbe⁺·¬mounted upon °the⁺ ⁼horses⁺ ꜝ¬prepare⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬chariots⁺ ꜝcome·out⁺ the⁺ ⁼¬warriors⁺ of·Ethiopians⁺ and Libues having·self-¬armed·fully to·¬weapons⁺ and ¬Lydias⁺ ꜝ¬ascend⁺ ꜝ¬stretch·tight⁺ °¬bow

20 ¬heifer ⁼having·self-¬bedecked ⁼Egypt ¬broken·branch off of·¬north came upon °her

28 °¬these⁺ says lord ¬¡see! I* I·¬raise upon °¬Babylon and upon °the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ °¬wind ⁼¬heat ⁼¬destroying

17 was·¬been·foolish all ⁼human off of·knowledge was·¬dishonored all ⁼¬goldsmith off of·the⁺ ⁼¬carvings⁺ of·him ¬that °lying⁺ they·¬cast·in·a·furnace not is breath in to·them

25 ¬¡see! I* unto °you °the ⁼mountain ⁼the ⁼having·self-¬destroyed ⁼the ⁼¬destroying °all ⁼the ⁼earth and I·will·¬stretch·out °the ⁼hand of·me upon °you and I·will·¬roll·downward °you off of·the⁺ ⁼rocks⁺ and I·will·give °you as °mountain ⁼having·been·¬burned

27 ꜝ¬take·up⁺ °sign upon of·the ⁼earth ꜝtrumpet⁺ in to·nations⁺ to·trumpet ꜝmake·holy⁺ upon °her °nations⁺ ꜝ¬announce⁺ upon °her to·kingdoms⁺ Ararat ¬from myˊ and to·the·ones⁺ ¬??? ꜝ¬approach⁺ upon °her °¬weaponries⁺ ꜝ¬pull·up⁺ upon °her °horse as of·¬locusts⁺ °¬multitude

29 was·¬shaken the ⁼earth and ¬suffered·pain ¬because ¬raised·up upon °¬Babylon ¬thought of·lord of·the·one to·¬place °the ⁼earth of·¬Babylon to °¬disappearance and ńot to·self-¬dwell °her

30 ¬failed ¬warrior of·¬Babylon of·the·one to·¬fight they·will·¬lower·themselves there in to·¬passage was·¬crushed the ⁼¬command of·them they·were·been·generated ¬like women⁺ was·¬burned °the⁺ ⁼¬tents⁺ of·her they·were·¬broken the⁺ ⁼¬bars⁺ of·her

31 ¬pursuing to °¬meeting of·¬pursuing will·¬pursue·himself and ¬announcing to °¬meeting of·¬announcing of·the·one to·¬announce to·the ⁼king of·¬Babylon ¬that has·¬captured the ⁼city of·him

32 off of·¬last of·the⁺ ⁼¬fords⁺ of·him they·were·taken and °the·ones⁺ ¬??? of·them they·¬burned in to·fire and men⁺ of·him the⁺ ⁼¬warriors⁺ they·come·out·themselves

33 ¬because °¬these⁺ says lord houses⁺ of·king of·¬Babylon as ¬threshing-floor ¬in·season they·will·be·¬threshed ¬still °¬small and will·¬come the ⁼¬harvest of·her

33 in to·¬beginning of·king Iōakim ⁼son ⁼¬Josiah was·been·generated the ⁼saying ⁼this ¬from of·lord

12 thus told lord ¬arose °¬ruin ¬painful ⁼the ⁼¬plague of·you

13 not is judging °judgment of·you to °¬painful you·were·¬treated ¬advantage not is to·you

14 all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬friends⁺ of·you they·¬forgot·themselves of·you not ńot they·will·¬question ¬that °¬plague of·¬enemy I·¬played °you °¬discipline ⁼¬strong upon °all ⁼¬unrighteousness of·you they·¬multiplied the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·you

16 through °this all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬eating °you they·will·be·¬eaten and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬enemies⁺ of·you °meat of·them all they·will·¬eat·themselves upon °¬multitude of·¬unrighteousnesses⁺ of·you they·were·¬multiplied the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·you they·did °these⁺ to·you and they·will·be·themselves the⁺ ⁼¬dispersing °you to °¬dispersion and °all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬??? °you I·will·give to °¬plunder

17 ¬that I·will·¬lead °the ⁼¬healing of·you off of·¬plague ⁼¬grievous I·should·¬treat °you ¬asserts lord ¬that having·self-seeded you·were·called ¬hunt of·you⁺ is ¬that ¬seeking not is °her

18 thus told lord ¬¡see! I* I·will·¬turn·away °the ⁼¬resettlement of·Ya‘aqob and °¬captivity of·him I·will·¬have·mercy and will·be·¬built city upon °the ⁼¬height of·her and the ⁼temple ¬according·to °the ⁼judgment of·him will·¬sit·down·himself

19 and they·will·come·out·themselves off of·them ¬singing and voice of·¬playing and I·should·¬increase °them and not ńot they·should·be·¬made·less

20 and they·will·come·to·themselves the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·them as °the ⁼¬before and the⁺ ⁼¬testimonies⁺ of·them ¬according·to °¬face of·me will·be·¬been·straight·up and I·will·¬visit·myself °the⁺ ⁼¬pressing·on °them

38 in to·the ⁼¬time ⁼that told lord I·will·be·myself to °God to·the ⁼¬gens of·Yisra’el and they they·will·be·themselves to·me to °people

2 thus told lord I·found °¬hot in to·¬deserted with of·having·¬destroyed in to·¬sword ꜝ¬proceed⁺ and ńot you⁺·should·¬destroy °the ⁼Yisra’el

42 ¬that thus told lord ¬as they·¬brought·upon upon °the ⁼people ⁼this °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼evils⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼greats⁺ ⁼these⁺ thus I* I·will·¬bring·upon upon °them °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼good⁺ ⁼which⁺ I·spoke upon °them
