44 and they·will·¬possess·themselves °fields⁺ in to·silver and you·will·write °¬scroll and you·will·¬seal·yourself and should·¬testify·solemnly °¬witnesses⁺ in to·earth of·¬Benjamin and ¬surrounding to·Yerushalam and in to·cities⁺ of·Yudah and in to·cities⁺ of·the ⁼mountain and in to·cities⁺ of·the Sefēla and in to·cities⁺ of·the Nageb ¬that I·will·¬turn·away °the⁺ ⁼¬resettlements⁺ of·them

40 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °¬Jeremiah ⁼second and he was ¬still having·self-¬bound in to·the ⁼¬palace of·the ⁼¬prison saying

2 thus told lord ⁼doing °earth and ¬molding °her of·the·one to·¬restore °her lord name to·him

3 ꜝhave·¬cried unto °me and I·will·be·¬answered to·you and I·will·¬announce to·you °greats⁺ and °¬strongs⁺ ⁼which⁺ not you·knew °them

4 ¬that thus told lord ⁼the ⁼God of·Yisra’el about of·houses⁺ of·the ⁼city ⁼this and about of·houses⁺ of·king ⁼Yudah of·the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬taken·down to °¬barricades⁺ and °¬battlements⁺

5 of·the·one to·self-¬quarrel unto °the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ and to·¬fulfill °her of·the⁺ ⁼corpses⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ °which⁺ I·¬struck in to·¬wrath of·me and in to·¬wrath of·me and I·¬turned·away °the ⁼¬face of·me off of·them about of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬evils⁺ of·them

6 ¬¡see! I* I·¬lead to·her °¬closing·of·a·wound and °¬healing and I·will·¬reveal to·them to·¬listen·to and I·will·¬treat °her and I·will·do to·them °peace and °¬trust

7 and I·will·¬turn °the ⁼¬resettlement of·Yudah and °the ⁼¬resettlement of·Yisra’el and I·will·¬build °them ¬as °the ⁼¬before

8 and I·will·¬clean °them off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬unrighteousnesses⁺ of·them of·which⁺ they·sinned to·me and not ńot I·will·be·¬remembered of·sins⁺ of·them of·which⁺ they·sinned to·me and they·¬left off myˊ

9 and will·be·himself to °¬joy and to °¬praise and to °¬majesty to·all ⁼the ⁼people of·the ⁼earth whos⁺ they·will·hear·themselves °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼good⁺ ⁼which⁺ I* I·will·do and they·will·be·¬feared and they·will·be·¬embittered about of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼good⁺ and about of·all ⁼the ⁼peace ⁼which I* I·will·do to·them

10 thus told lord ¬still will·be·heard in to·the ⁼¬place ⁼this ⁼which you⁺ you⁺·say ¬deserted is off of·humans⁺ and of·¬animals⁺ in to·cities⁺ of·Yudah and ¬outside of·Yerushalam to·the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬layed·waste ¬from °the·one ńot to·be °human and °¬animals⁺

11 voice of·¬joy and voice of·¬joyfulness voice of·bridegroom and voice of·bride voice of·saying ꜝ¬agree⁺·yourselves⁺ to·lord ⁼¬almighty ¬that ¬good ⁼lord ¬that to °the ⁼eternity the ⁼mercy of·him and they·will·¬bring·in °¬gifts⁺ to °house of·lord ¬that I·will·¬turn·away °all ⁼the ⁼¬resettlement of·the ⁼earth ⁼that ¬according·to °the·one ¬previously told lord

43 and in to·the ⁼¬year ⁼the ⁼fourth Iōakim ⁼son ⁼¬Josiah ⁼king ⁼Yudah was·been·generated saying of·lord unto °me saying

3 ¬perhaps will·hear·himself the ⁼house of·Yudah °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼evils⁺ ⁼which⁺ I* I·¬count·myself to·do to·them so·that they·should·¬turn·away off of·¬road of·them of·the ⁼¬evil and ¬propitious I·will·be·myself to·the⁺ ⁼¬unrighteousnesses⁺ of·them and to·the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·them

30 through °this thus told lord upon Iōakim ⁼king of·Yudah not will·be·himself to·him self-¬sitting upon of·throne ⁼David and the ⁼¬decaying·flesh of·him will·be·himself having·self-¬thrown in to·the ⁼¬heat of·the ⁼day and in to·the ⁼¬icy·coldness of·the ⁼night

44 and became·king Sedekias ⁼son of·¬Josiah anti Iōakim °which became·king Nabouchodonosor to·become·king of·the ⁼Yudah

2 and not heard he and the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·him and the ⁼people of·the ⁼earth °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·lord °which⁺ spoke in to·hand of·¬Jeremiah

3 and missioned·off the ⁼king Sedekias °the Iōachal ⁼son Selemiou and °the Sofonian ⁼son Maasaiou °the ⁼priest unto °¬Jeremiah saying ꜝ¬pray·yourself ¬so about of·us unto °lord

4 and ¬Jeremiah came and ¬passed·through through of·¬midst of·the ⁼city and not they·gave °him to °house of·the ⁼¬prison

8 and they·will·¬live they ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ and they·will·¬fight upon °the ⁼city ⁼this and they·will·¬seize·themselves °her and they·will·¬kindle °her in to·fire

9 ¬that thus told lord ńot you⁺·should·¬take·up to·the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ of·you⁺ saying ⁼¬running·from they·will·come·off·themselves off of·us the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ ¬that not ńot they·should·come·off

10 and ifᵮ you⁺·should·¬strike °all ⁼ability of·the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬fighting °you⁺ and they·should·be·¬left·behind whatever⁺ ⁼having·self-¬pierced ¬each in to·the ⁼¬place of·him these⁺ they·will·¬arise·themselves and they·will·¬kindle °the ⁼city ⁼this in to·fire

11 and was·generated·himself when ¬ascended the ⁼ability of·the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ off of·Yerushalam off of·¬face of·the ⁼ability of·¬Pharaoh

12 came·out ¬Jeremiah off of·Yerushalam of·the·one to·be·¬travelled to °earth of·¬Benjamin of·the·one to·¬buy ¬from·there in to·¬midst of·the ⁼people

13 and was·generated·himself he in to·gate of·¬Benjamin and there human ¬from to·which ¬destroyed Sarouias ⁼son Selemiou ⁼son ⁼¬Ananias and ¬seized °the ⁼¬Jeremiah saying unto °the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ you you·¬flee

14 and told lie not to °the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ I* I·¬flee and not heard of·him and ¬seized Sarouias °the ⁼¬Jeremiah and ¬brought·in °him unto °the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺

15 and they·were·¬embittered the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ upon °¬Jeremiah and they·¬struck °him and they·missioned·off °him to °the ⁼house Iōnathan ⁼the ⁼writer ¬that °this they·did to °house of·¬prison

16 and came ¬Jeremiah to °house of·the ⁼¬pit and to °the·one ¬??? and ¬seated there °days⁺ ⁼many⁺

17 and missioned·off Sedekias and called °him and ¬asked °him the ⁼king ¬secretly to·tell if is saying ¬from of·lord and told is to °hands⁺ of·king of·¬Babylon you·will·be·¬delivered

18 and told ¬Jeremiah to·the ⁼king what I·¬harmed °you and °the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you and °the ⁼people ⁼this ¬that you you·give °me to °house of·¬prison

19 and ¬where? they·are the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ of·you⁺ the⁺ ⁼¬prophesying to·you⁺ saying ¬that not ńot should·come king of·¬Babylon upon °the ⁼earth ⁼this

20 and now lord ⁼king ꜝlet·them·¬collapse the ⁼mercy of·me ¬according·to °¬face of·you and °what you·¬turn·away °me to °house Iōnathan ⁼the ⁼writer and not ńot I·should·die·off there

21 and ¬directed the ⁼king and they·threw·in °him to °house of·the ⁼¬prison and they·gave·themselves to·him °bread ⁼one of·the ⁼day ¬outside of·which they·¬bake ¬until they·¬failed the⁺ ⁼breads⁺ out of·the ⁼city and ¬seated ¬Jeremiah in to·the ⁼¬palace of·the ⁼¬prison

45 and heard Safatias ⁼son Mathan and Godolias ⁼son Paschōr and Iōachal ⁼son Selemiou °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼which⁺ spoke ¬Jeremiah upon °the ⁼people saying

2 thus told lord ⁼the ⁼¬dwelling in to·the ⁼city ⁼this will·die·off·himself in to·¬sword and in to·¬famine and the ⁼self-¬departing unto °the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ will·live·himself and will·be·himself the ⁼soul of·him to °¬unexpected·gain and will·live·himself

3 ¬that thus told lord self-¬delivering will·be·¬delivered the ⁼city ⁼this to °hands⁺ of·ability of·king of·¬Babylon and will·¬seize·himself °her

4 and they·told to·the ⁼king ꜝlet·them·be·¬killed ¬so the ⁼human ⁼that ¬that he ¬faints °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬fighting ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬leaving·behind in to·the ⁼city and °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·all ⁼the ⁼people speaking unto °them ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼these⁺ ¬that the ⁼human ⁼this not you·¬speak·oracles °peace to·the ⁼people ⁼this but or °¬evils⁺

5 and told the ⁼king ¬¡see! he in to·hands⁺ of·you⁺ ¬that not was·able·himself the ⁼king unto °them

6 and they·¬threw °him to °the ⁼¬pit Melchiou ⁼son ⁼the ⁼king which was in to·the ⁼¬palace of·the ⁼¬prison and they·¬lowered °him to °the ⁼¬pit and in to·the ⁼¬pit not was water but or ¬mire and was in to·the ⁼¬mire

7 and heard Abdemelech ⁼the ⁼Ethiopian and he in to·house of·the ⁼king ¬that they·gave °¬Jeremiah to °the ⁼¬pit and the ⁼king was in to·the ⁼gate of·¬Benjamin

8 and came·out unto °him and spoke unto °the ⁼king and told

9 you·¬acted·wickedly·yourself °which⁺ you·did of·the·one to·kill·off °the ⁼human ⁼this off of·¬face of·the ⁼¬famine ¬that not they·are ¬still breads⁺ in to·the ⁼city

10 and ¬ordered·himself the ⁼king to·the Abdemelech saying ꜝtake to °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·you ¬from·here thirty °humans⁺ and ꜝ¬lead °him out of·the ⁼¬pit so·that ńot should·die·off

11 and took Abdemelech °the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ and came·to to °the ⁼house of·the ⁼king °the·one ¬??? and took ¬from·there °¬olds⁺ ⁼¬cloths⁺ and °¬olds⁺ ⁼¬ropes⁺ and ¬threw °them unto °¬Jeremiah to °the ⁼¬pit

12 and told °these⁺ ꜝ¬place ¬under of·the⁺ ⁼¬ropes⁺ and did ¬Jeremiah thus

16 and ¬sweared to·him the ⁼king ⁼saying lives lord ⁼which did to·us °the ⁼soul ⁼this if I·will·kill·off °you and if I·will·give °you to °hands⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ⁼these⁺

17 and told to·him ¬Jeremiah thus told lord ifᵮ coming·out you·should·come·out unto °¬rulers⁺ of·king of·¬Babylon and will·live·himself the ⁼soul of·you and the ⁼city ⁼this not ńot should·be·¬burned in to·fire and you·will·live·yourself you and the ⁼house of·you

18 and ifᵮ ńot you·should·come·out will·be·given the ⁼city ⁼this to °hands⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ and they·will·¬kindle °her in to·fire and you not ńot you·should·be·¬saved

19 and told the ⁼king to·the ⁼¬Jeremiah I* °saying I·have of·the⁺ ⁼Yudaeans⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·¬fled unto °the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ ńot to·be·going·to·give °me to °hands⁺ of·them and they·will·¬deride·themselves of·me

20 and told ¬Jeremiah not ńot they·should·¬deliver °you ꜝhear °the ⁼saying of·lord °which I* I·say unto °you and ¬better will·be·himself to·you and will·live·himself the ⁼soul of·you

21 and if ńot you·¬will you to·come·out this ⁼the ⁼saying °which ¬showed to·me lord

25 and ifᵮ they·should·hear the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ ¬that I·spoke to·you and they·should·come unto °you and they·should·¬say to·you ꜝ¬announce to·us °what spoke to·you the ⁼king ńot you·should·¬hide off of·us and not ńot we·should·be·¬gone·up °you and °what spoke unto °you the ⁼king

8 and came unto Godolian to Massēfa Ismaēl ⁼son Nathaniou and Iōanan ⁼son Karēe and Saraias ⁼son Thanaemeth and sons⁺ ¬??? of·the Netōfati and Iezonias ⁼son of·the·one ¬??? they and the⁺ ⁼men⁺ of·them

10 and ¬¡see! I* I·¬sit·myself ¬in·front·of of·you⁺ to Massēfa to·stand ¬according·to °¬face of·the·ones⁺ of·¬Chaldeans⁺ which⁺ iᵮ they·should·come upon °you⁺ and you⁺ ꜝ¬assemble⁺ °wine and °¬fruit and ꜝ¬assemble⁺ °¬olive·oil and ꜝthrow⁺ to °the⁺ ⁼¬jars⁺ of·you⁺ and ꜝ¬dwell⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ ⁼which⁺ you⁺·¬held·firmly

11 and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼Yudaeans⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ in to·earth Mōab and in to·sons⁺ Ammōn and the·ones⁺ in to·the ⁼¬Idumea and the·ones⁺ in to·all ⁼the ⁼earth they·heard ¬that gave king of·¬Babylon °¬remnant to·the ⁼Yudah and ¬that ¬appointed upon °them °the Godolian ⁼son Achikam

12 and they·came unto Godolian to °earth of·Yudah to Massēfa and they·¬assembled °wine and °¬fruit ⁼much ¬very and °¬olive·oil

14 and they·told to·him if to·knowledge you·know ¬that ¬??? king of·sons⁺ Ammōn missioned·off unto °you °the Ismaēl to·¬strike of·you °soul and not trusted to·them Godolias

15 and Iōanan told to·the Godolia ¬secretly in Massēfa I·will·¬travel·myself ¬so and I·will·¬strike °the Ismaēl and ¬nothing ꜝlet·them·know ńot you·will·¬strike·yourself of·you °soul and should·be·¬scattered all ⁼Yudah the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬assembled unto °you and they·will·¬destroy·themselves the⁺ ⁼¬remainings⁺ of·Yudah

16 and told Godolias unto Iōanan ńot you·should·do °the ⁼¬thing ⁼this ¬that °lying⁺ you you·say about Ismaēl

48 and was·generated·himself to·the ⁼month ⁼the ⁼seventh came Ismaēl ⁼son Nathaniou ⁼son Elasa off of·¬gens of·the ⁼king and ten men⁺ with of·him unto Godolian to Massēfa and they·¬ate there °bread ¬together

2 and ¬arose Ismaēl and the·ones⁺ ten men⁺ ⁼which⁺ they·were with of·him and they·¬struck °the Godolian ⁼which ¬appointed king of·¬Babylon upon of·the ⁼earth

3 and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼Yudaeans⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼being with of·him in Massēfa and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼found there

4 and was·generated·himself to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼second of·¬striking of·him °the Godolian and human not knew

5 and they·came men⁺ off of·¬Shechem and off of·¬Salem and off of·¬Samaria eighty men⁺ ⁼having·self-¬shaved °beards⁺ and ¬??? °the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ and self-chopping and ¬gift and ¬frankincense in to·hands⁺ of·them of·the·one to·¬bring·in to °house of·lord

6 and came·out to °¬meeting to·them Ismaēl they they·¬travelled·themselves and they·¬wept and told to·them ꜝcome·to⁺ unto Godolian

7 and was·generated·himself of·coming·to of·them to °the ⁼¬midst of·the ⁼city ¬slaughtered °them to °the ⁼¬well

8 and ten men⁺ they·were·found there and they·told to·the Ismaēl ńot you·should·be·¬gone·up °us ¬that they·are to·us treasures⁺ in to·field ¬wheats⁺ and ¬barleys⁺ honey and ¬olive·oil and ¬passed·by and not ¬killed °them in to·¬midst of·the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·them

9 and °the ⁼¬well to which ¬threw there Ismaēl °all⁺ ⁼which⁺ ¬struck ¬well °great ⁼this is which did the ⁼king ⁼¬Asaph off of·¬face Baasa ⁼king ⁼Yisra’el °this ¬filled·up Ismaēl of·trauma-deads⁺

10 and ¬turned·away Ismaēl °all ⁼the ⁼people ⁼the ⁼¬left·behind to Massēfa and °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·the ⁼king °which⁺ ¬??? the ⁼¬chief·guard to·the Godolia ⁼son Achikam and ¬was·undone·himself to °the·one ¬other·side of·sons⁺ Ammōn

12 and they·¬brought °¬all ⁼the ⁼¬army·camp of·them and they·¬were·undone·themselves to·¬fight °him and they·found °him upon of·water of·much in Gabaōn

13 and was·generated·himself when they·¬saw all ⁼the ⁼people ⁼the·one with Ismaēl °the Iōanan and °the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·the ⁼ability ⁼the·one with of·him

14 and they·¬lived unto Iōanan

15 and Ismaēl was·¬saved wiŧh eight to·humans⁺ and ¬was·undone·himself unto °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Ammōn

16 and took Iōanan and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·the ⁼ability the·ones⁺ with of·him °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬remainings⁺ of·the ⁼people °which⁺ ¬turned·away off Ismaēl °ables⁺ ⁼men⁺ in to·¬war and °the⁺ ⁼women⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬remainings⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬eunuches⁺ ⁼which⁺ ¬turned·away off Gabaōn

49 and they·came·unto all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·the ⁼ability and Iōanan and Azarias ⁼son Maasaiou and all ⁼the ⁼people off of·¬small ¬until of·great

2 unto °¬Jeremiah ⁼the ⁼¬prophet and they·told to·him ꜝlet·them·¬collapse ¬so °the ⁼mercy of·us ¬according·to °¬face of·you and to·¬pray unto °lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you about of·the⁺ ⁼¬remainings⁺ ⁼these⁺ ¬that we·were·¬left·behind ¬littles⁺ off of·many⁺ ¬as the⁺ ⁼¬eyes⁺ of·you they·look

3 and ꜝlet·them·¬announce to·us lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you °the ⁼¬road to·which we·will·¬travel·ourselves in to·her and °saying ⁼which we·will·do

4 and told to·them ¬Jeremiah I·heard ¬¡see! I* I·will·¬pray·myself unto °lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·you⁺ and will·be·himself the ⁼saying °which iᵮ will·be·¬answered lord I·will·¬announce to·you⁺ not ńot I·should·¬hide off of·you⁺ °¬declaration

5 and they they·told to·the ⁼¬Jeremiah ꜝlet·them·be lord in to·us to °¬witness ⁼¬just and °¬faithful if ńot ¬according·to °all ⁼the ⁼saying ⁼which iᵮ should·mission·off °you lord unto °us thus we·will·do

6 and ifᵮ °good and ifᵮ °evil °the ⁼voice of·lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us of·which we we·mission·off °you unto °him we·will·hear·ourselves so·that ¬better to·us should·be·generated·himself ¬that we·will·hear·ourselves of·the ⁼voice of·lord ⁼the ⁼God of·us

7 and was·been·generated with ten °days⁺ was·been·generated saying of·lord unto °¬Jeremiah

8 and called °the Iōanan and °the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·the ⁼ability and °all ⁼the ⁼people off of·¬small ¬until of·great

9 and told to·them thus told lord

10 ifᵮ ¬seating you⁺·should·¬seat in to·the ⁼earth ⁼this I·will·¬build °you⁺ and not ńot I·should·¬take·down and I·should·¬plant °you⁺ and not ńot I·¬pluck·out ¬that I·have·¬given·rest·myself upon to·the⁺ ⁼evils⁺ ⁼which⁺ I·did to·you⁺

11 ńot you⁺·should·be·¬feared off of·¬face of·king of·¬Babylon of·which you⁺ you⁺·¬fear·yourselves⁺ off of·¬face of·him ńot you⁺·should·be·¬feared ¬asserts lord ¬that with of·you⁺ I* I·am of·the·one to·self-¬take·out °you⁺ and to·¬save °you⁺ out of·hand of·him

12 and I·will·give to·you⁺ °mercy and I·will·¬have·mercy °you⁺ and I·will·¬turn °you⁺ to °the ⁼earth of·you⁺

13 and if you⁺·say you⁺ not ńot we·should·¬seat in to·the ⁼earth ⁼this unto °the·one ńot to·hear of·voice of·lord

14 ¬that to °earth of·Egypt we·will·come·to·ourselves and not ńot we·should·¬see °¬war and °voice of·trumpet not ńot we·should·hear and in to·breads⁺ not ńot we·should·hunger and there we·will·¬dwell

15 through °this ꜝhear⁺ °saying of·lord thus told lord ifᵮ you⁺ you⁺·should·give °the ⁼¬face of·you⁺ to °Egypt and you⁺·should·come·to there to·¬dwell

16 and will·be·himself the ⁼¬sword °which you⁺ you⁺·¬fear·yourselves⁺ off of·¬face of·her will·find °you⁺ in to·earth of·Egypt and the ⁼¬famine of·which you⁺ °saying you⁺·have off of·¬face of·him will·¬grasp·himself °you⁺ ¬after of·you⁺ in to·Egypt and there you⁺·will·die·off·yourselves⁺

17 and they·will·be·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬foreigns⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬placing °the ⁼¬face of·them to °earth of·Egypt to·¬dwell·in there they·will·¬fail in to·the ⁼¬sword and in to·the ⁼¬famine and not will·be·himself of·them no·one ⁼self-¬saving off of·the⁺ ⁼evils⁺ ⁼which⁺ I* I·¬bring·upon upon °them

18 ¬that thus told lord ¬as ¬dripped the ⁼¬wrath of·me upon °the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling °Yerushalam thus will·¬drip the ⁼¬wrath of·me upon °you⁺ of·coming·to of·you⁺ to °Egypt and you⁺·will·be·yourselves⁺ to °¬impassable and ¬under·one's·hands⁺ and to °¬curse and to °¬reproach and not ńot you⁺·should·¬see ¬not·any·more °the ⁼¬place ⁼this

19 °which⁺ spoke lord upon °you⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬remainings⁺ of·Yudah ńot you⁺·should·come·to to °Egypt and now knowing you⁺·will·know·yourselves⁺

20 ¬that you⁺·¬acted·wickedly·yourselves⁺ in to·souls⁺ of·you⁺ missioning·off °me saying ꜝ¬pray·yourself about of·us unto °lord and ¬according·to °all⁺ ⁼which⁺ ifᵮ you·will·speak·yourself to·you lord we·will·do

21 and not you⁺·heard of·the ⁼voice of·lord of·which missioned·off °me unto °you⁺

22 and now in to·¬sword and in to·¬famine you⁺·will·¬fail in to·the ⁼¬place of·which you⁺ you⁺·¬plan·yourselves⁺ to·come·to to·¬dwell there

50 and was·been·generated as ¬ceased·himself ¬Jeremiah ⁼saying unto °the ⁼people °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·lord °which⁺ missioned·off °him lord unto °them ⁼all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼these⁺

2 and told Azarias ⁼son Maasaiou and Iōanan ⁼son Karēe and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬saying to·the ⁼¬Jeremiah saying °lies⁺ not missioned·off °you lord unto °us saying ńot you⁺·should·come·to to °Egypt to·¬dwell there

3 but or Barouch ⁼son Nēriou ¬ponders °you unto °us so·that you·should·give °us to °hands⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬Chaldeans⁺ of·the·one to·put·to·death °us and ¬??? °us to °¬Babylon

4 and not heard Iōanan and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·the ⁼ability and all ⁼the ⁼people of·the ⁼voice of·lord to·¬dwell in to·earth of·Yudah

5 and took Iōanan and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·the ⁼ability °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬remainings⁺ of·Yudah °the⁺ ⁼¬turning·away to·¬dwell in to·the ⁼earth

6 °the⁺ ⁼ables⁺ ⁼men⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼women⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·the ⁼king and °the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ ⁼which⁺ ¬left·behind Nabouzardan with Godoliou ⁼son Achikam and °¬Jeremiah ⁼the ⁼¬prophet and Barouch ⁼son Nēriou

7 and they·came·to to °Egypt ¬that not they·heard of·the ⁼voice of·lord and they·came·to to Tafnas

8 and was·generated·himself saying of·lord unto °¬Jeremiah in Tafnas saying

9 ꜝtake to·yourself °stones⁺ ⁼greats⁺ and ꜝ¬hide °them in to·¬thresholds⁺ in to·gate of·the ⁼house of·¬Pharaoh in Tafnas ¬according·to °¬eyes⁺ of·men⁺ of·Yudah

10 and you·will·¬say thus told lord ¬¡see! I* I·mission·off and I·will·¬bring Nabouchodonosor ⁼king of·¬Babylon and will·¬place of·him °the ⁼throne ¬above of·the⁺ ⁼stones⁺ ⁼these⁺ ⁼which⁺ you·¬hid and will·¬take·up °the⁺ ⁼¬weapons⁺ of·him upon °them

11 and will·come·to·himself and will·¬strike °earth of·Egypt °which⁺ to °death to °death and °which⁺ to °¬settlement to °¬settlement and °which⁺ to °¬sword to °¬sword

12 and will·¬kindle °fire in to·houses⁺ of·Gods⁺ of·them and will·¬burn °them and will·¬exile °them and will·¬fumigate °earth of·Egypt ¬just·as ¬fumigates ¬flocksman °the ⁼cloak of·him and will·come·out·himself in to·peace

13 and will·¬break °the⁺ ⁼pillars⁺ of·sun of·city °the·ones⁺ in to·which and °the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·them will·¬burn in to·fire

51 the ⁼saying ⁼the ⁼self-generated unto °¬Jeremiah to·¬alls⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼Yudaeans⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling in to·earth ⁼Egypt and to·the⁺ ⁼self-¬sitting in ¬??? and in Tafnas and in to·earth Pathourēs saying

2 thus told lord ⁼the ⁼God of·Yisra’el you⁺ you⁺·have·¬seen °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼evils⁺ ⁼which⁺ they·¬brought·upon upon °Yerushalam and upon °the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·Yudah and ¬¡see! they·are ¬deserteds⁺ off ¬dwelling·in

3 off of·¬face of·¬evil of·them of·which they·did to·¬rebel °me ¬travelled to·¬burn·incense to·Gods⁺ ⁼óthers⁺ ⁼which⁺ not you⁺·knew

4 and I·missioned·off unto °you⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·me °the⁺ ⁼¬prophets⁺ of·¬dawn and I·missioned·off saying ńot you⁺·should·do °the ⁼¬thing of·the ⁼¬contamination ⁼this ⁼which I·¬hated

5 and not they·heard of·me and not they·¬bowed °the ⁼ear of·them to·¬turn·away off of·the⁺ ⁼evils⁺ of·them unto °the·one ńot to·¬burn·incense to·Gods⁺ ⁼óthers⁺

7 and now thus told lord ⁼¬almighty so·that °what you⁺ you⁺·do °evils⁺ ⁼greats⁺ upon to·souls⁺ of·you⁺ to·¬prevent of·you⁺ °human and °woman °¬child and °suckling out of·¬midst ⁼Yudah unto °the·one ńot to·be·¬left·behind of·you⁺ °¬nothing

8 ꜝ¬rebel·yourself °me in to·the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·you⁺ to·¬burn·incense to·Gods⁺ ⁼óthers⁺ in to·earth ⁼Egypt to °which you⁺·came·to to·¬dwell·in there so·that you⁺·should·¬prevent and so·that you⁺·should·be·generated·yourselves⁺ to °¬curse and to °¬reproach in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ of·the ⁼earth

9 ńot you⁺·have·¬forgotten·yourselves⁺ you⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼evils⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ and of·the⁺ ⁼evils⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼kings⁺ of·Yudah and of·the⁺ ⁼evils⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·you⁺ and of·the⁺ ⁼evils⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·you⁺ of·which⁺ they·did in to·earth of·Yudah and ¬outside of·Yerushalam
